original: @133b # // rgya gar skad du /üîΩtatva sam gra ha panydzi ka / bod skad du /
analyzed: @133b # // rgya gar skad du / tatva sam gra ha panydzi ka / bod skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:üîΩTattvasamgrahapa√±jikƒÅ

original: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩCommentary on the Compendium of Principles

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩgang zhig shes bya'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i stobs kyis gzhan don dmyal ba la sogs kyi //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo // gang zhig shes bya'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i stobs kyis gzhan don dmyal ba la sogs kyi //
translated: Homage to the noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the youthful one.

original: sdug bsngal zhi byed de nyid rtogs pa'i bdud rtsi thugs rjes 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa //
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhi byed de nyid rtogs pa'i bdud rtsi thugs rjes 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa //
translated: By the power of churning the ocean of objects of knowledge, for the benefit of others, the nectar of realizing reality that pacifies the suffering of hell and so forth,üîΩis the nectar that satisfies migrating beings with compassion.

original: de nyid rig mchog 'gro ba rnams kyi ston pa de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: de nyid rig mchog 'gro ba rnams kyi ston pa de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: Having respectfully paid homage to that teacher of migrating beings, the supreme knower of reality,

original: de nyid bsdus pa 'di yi dka' 'grel ches rab gsal ba rab tu brtsam par bya //
analyzed: de nyid bsdus pa 'di yi dka' 'grel ches rab gsal ba rab tu brtsam par bya //
translated: I will compose this very clear commentary on this Compendium of Reality.

original: bdag 'dra'i blo gros blun po rnams kyis sngon med dngos po nam yang brjod mi nus //
analyzed: bdag 'dra'i blo gros blun po rnams kyis sngon med dngos po nam yang brjod mi nus //
translated: Those with foolish intellects like me can never express anything that has not been said before.

original: mkhas pas nyin re lam 'di mang du ma dpyad pa yang 'ga' tsam gang na yod //
analyzed: mkhas pas nyin re lam 'di mang du ma dpyad pa yang 'ga' tsam gang na yod //
translated: What wise person would not analyze this path many times each day?

original: 'on kyang bsod nams 'phel bar 'dod pas rang don mchog gi bdag gi blo gros 'di //
analyzed: 'on kyang bsod nams 'phel bar 'dod pas rang don mchog gi bdag gi blo gros 'di //
translated: But those who wish to increase their merit should cultivate this supreme self-interest,

original: dge ba 'phel ba'i 'bras bu can gyi de nyid goms pas 'di byed pa la brtson //üîΩbstan bcos 'di la ni rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams dang por brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa des par sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa dang / chen po dag la rab tu dang ba ni legs pa thams cad 'thob pa'i rgyu yin no zhes nges par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la dang ba bskyed pa'i don dang /üîΩnyan pa po bstan bcos 'di la gus pas 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rang gi ston pa la mchod pa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: dge ba 'phel ba'i 'bras bu can gyi de nyid goms pas 'di byed pa la brtson // bstan bcos 'di la ni rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams dang por brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa des par sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa dang / chen po dag la rab tu dang ba ni legs pa thams cad 'thob pa'i rgyu yin no zhes nges par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la dang ba bskyed pa'i don dang / nyan pa po bstan bcos 'di la gus pas 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rang gi ston pa la mchod pa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: this wisdom which is the cause of the increase of virtue.üîΩIn this treatise, those who are wise should first understand that faith in the Teacher, the teaching, and the spiritual community is the cause for obtaining all that is good.üîΩThen, in order to generate faith in the Lord Buddha, and in order to induce the listeners to enter into this treatise with respect, one should first perform the rite of worship to one's own teacher.

original: gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung //
analyzed: gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung //
translated: Then, in order to enter into the treatise, one should understand the meaning of its title.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de nyid bsdu bar bya zhes bya ba 'di'i bar dag gis bstan bcos 'di'i brjod par bya ba dang dgos pa bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de nyid bsdu bar bya zhes bya ba 'di'i bar dag gis bstan bcos 'di'i brjod par bya ba dang dgos pa bstan to //
translated: The verse beginning with ‚ÄúThe ultimate truth of cessation‚Äù and ending with ‚ÄúI will now compose this treatise‚Äù indicates the subject matter and purpose of this treatise.

original: 'di ltar gal te 'di'i brjod par bya ba ma bstan na de'i tshe smyon pa la sogs pa'i tshig dang 'dra bar don med pa nyid srid pas rtogs pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te 'di'i brjod par bya ba ma bstan na de'i tshe smyon pa la sogs pa'i tshig dang 'dra bar don med pa nyid srid pas rtogs pa dang ldan pa /
translated: If the subject matter of this treatise is not indicated, then like the words of a madman, it would be meaningless, and so it would not be possible to understand it.

original: nyan pa la yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di'i brjod par bya ba gdon mi za bar bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nyan pa la yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di'i brjod par bya ba gdon mi za bar bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, in order to engage the listener who possesses understanding, the subject matter must be indicated without doubt.

original: de bzhin du brjod par bya ba yod na yang mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa dang bral ba'i bstan bcos ni bya rog gi so brtag pa la sogs pa bzhin du rtog pa dang ldan ba nyan pa la yang gus par mi byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du brjod par bya ba yod na yang mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa dang bral ba'i bstan bcos ni bya rog gi so brtag pa la sogs pa bzhin du rtog pa dang ldan ba nyan pa la yang gus par mi byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Similarly, even if the subject matter exists, a treatise devoid of the desired purpose, like the examination of a crow‚Äôs teeth, would not be respected by the listener who possesses understanding.

original: de lta bas na dang bor de la 'jug pa'i don du dgos pa brjod bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na dang bor de la 'jug pa'i don du dgos pa brjod bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to engage the listener, the purpose must be stated first.

original: 'jug pa'i yan @134a * //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yan @134a * //
translated: The branches of engagementüîΩ

original: lag la gtso bo nyid dgos pa yin te /
analyzed: lag la gtso bo nyid dgos pa yin te /
translated: The purpose of the treatise is the principal factor in the subsidiary factor of engagement,

original: de don du gnyer bas nyan pa po'i skye bo bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de don du gnyer bas nyan pa po'i skye bo bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the treatise is engaged by the person who listens to it for the sake of that purpose.

original: de yang brjod byas stong pa'i bstan bcos kyis bsgrubs par mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang brjod byas stong pa'i bstan bcos kyis bsgrubs par mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: And that purpose cannot be accomplished by a treatise that is empty of subject matter,

original: bstan bcos kyi dgos ba'i thabs bstan pa'i don du brjod par bya ba smras so //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyi dgos ba'i thabs bstan pa'i don du brjod par bya ba smras so //
translated: so the subject matter is stated for the purpose of teaching the means for the purpose of the treatise.

original: dgos pa de yang rjes su mthun pa'i thabs can du bstan par bya ba'i phyir de bsgrub pa nyams su len par mi nus pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dgos pa de yang rjes su mthun pa'i thabs can du bstan par bya ba'i phyir de bsgrub pa nyams su len par mi nus pa ni ma yin te /
translated: And that purpose is also to be taught as having suitable means, so it is not that it cannot be accomplished.

original: de lta ma yin na dgos pa yod na yang 'jog po'i gtsug gi rims nad sel ba'i rin po che /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dgos pa yod na yang 'jog po'i gtsug gi rims nad sel ba'i rin po che /
translated: Otherwise, even if there is a purpose, it would be like the treatise on the method of ornaments, which is not able to accomplish that purpose.

original: rgyan gyi man ngag gi bstan bcos bzhin du de bsgrub par mi nus par rig nas rtog pa dang ldan pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyan gyi man ngag gi bstan bcos bzhin du de bsgrub par mi nus par rig nas rtog pa dang ldan pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Knowing that it cannot be accomplished, the wise would not engage in it.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: 'brel pa dang ni rjes mthun thabs //
analyzed: 'brel pa dang ni rjes mthun thabs //
translated: it is related and has suitable means.

original: skyes bu'i don ni rjod byed dag / yongs brtags dbang du byas yin gyi //
analyzed: skyes bu'i don ni rjod byed dag / yongs brtags dbang du byas yin gyi //
translated: The meaning of the person is the subject matter, which is imagined in dependence on the power of the expression.

original: de las gzhan pa'i dbang byas min //üîΩzhes bshad do //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i dbang byas min // zhes bshad do //
translated: It is not dependent on anything else.

original: de lta bas na bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: de lta bas na bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
translated: Thus, the subject matter and so on are taught in order to introduce the treatise.

original: 'on te rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ni nges pa nyid las yin zhing /
analyzed: 'on te rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ni nges pa nyid las yin zhing /
translated: But the introduction of those who are intelligent is from certainty itself.

original: nges pa yang tshad ma nyid las yin la /
analyzed: nges pa yang tshad ma nyid las yin la /
translated: And certainty is from valid knowledge itself.

original: 'dir dgos pa'i tshig 'di ni brjod par bya ba la sogs pa phyi rol gyi don la tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir dgos pa'i tshig 'di ni brjod par bya ba la sogs pa phyi rol gyi don la tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Here, the purpose statement is not a valid means of knowledge in regard to external objects such as the subject matter, because it is not related to them.

original: de dang de la 'brel pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dang de la 'brel pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is not related to them in that way, because it is not related to them in any way.

original: 'di ltar re zhig de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa ni med de /
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa ni med de /
translated: For example, it is not related to them by the nature of identity,

original: shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are completely different.

original: de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba yang med de /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel ba yang med de /
translated: Nor is it related to them by the nature of origination,

original: tshig ni 'dod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig ni 'dod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the words are related only to mere desire.

original: tshig 'brel pa med pa'i phyir shes par 'dod pa'i don la shes pa skyed bzhin pa na tshad mar rigs pa yang ma yin te /üîΩha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig 'brel pa med pa'i phyir shes par 'dod pa'i don la shes pa skyed bzhin pa na tshad mar rigs pa yang ma yin te / ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not tenable that a cognition is valid with respect to the object that is to be cognized while it is being generated, because it is related to the words, and because it is excessive.

original: tshig ni brjod par 'dod pa la tshad ma nyid yin mod kyi /
analyzed: tshig ni brjod par 'dod pa la tshad ma nyid yin mod kyi /
translated: Words are indeed valid cognitions with respect to what is to be expressed.

original: 'on kyang de rtog pa dang ldan pa 'jug pa'i yan lag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de rtog pa dang ldan pa 'jug pa'i yan lag ni ma yin te /
translated: However, they are not a limb for engaging with what is conceptual.

original: 'di ltar ji ltar brjod par 'dod pa gang dag yin pa de dag de kho na bzhin du sgrub pa'i dus su byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ji ltar brjod par 'dod pa gang dag yin pa de dag de kho na bzhin du sgrub pa'i dus su byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: This is because it is not the case that whatever is to be expressed is done just as it is at the time of the treatise.

original: dam bcas na yang slu ba'i bsam pas rnam pa gzhan du bstan bcos byed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bcas na yang slu ba'i bsam pas rnam pa gzhan du bstan bcos byed pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because even if one makes a promise, it is possible that one will compose the treatise in a different way due to a deceptive thought.

original: gzhan yang bstan bcos kyi dgos pa tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs pa gang yin pa de la dgos pa'i ngag nye bar bkod pa don @134b med pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang bstan bcos kyi dgos pa tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs pa gang yin pa de la dgos pa'i ngag nye bar bkod pa don @134b med pa nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, the statement of the purpose of the treatise is pointless for one who understands the purpose of the treatise through another valid cognition.

original: de ni tshad ma gzhan kho na las 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni tshad ma gzhan kho na las 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because one engages with the treatise through another valid cognition.

original: gang yang bstan bcos kyi dgos pa tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod pa de la yang don med pa gsal rab pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang yang bstan bcos kyi dgos pa tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod pa de la yang don med pa gsal rab pa nyid de /
translated: Also, if the purpose of the treatise is contradicted by other valid cognitions, then it is clearly pointless.

original: de ni tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod pa nyid kyi phyir 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod pa nyid kyi phyir 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradicted by other valid cognitions, it is impossible to engage in it.

original: 'di gnyi ga yang khas blangs nas brjod kyi /
analyzed: 'di gnyi ga yang khas blangs nas brjod kyi /
translated: Both of these are stated on the assumption that they exist.

original: gang gis 'di dag yod pa'am med par rtogs par 'gyur ba tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis 'jug pa las sngar dgos pa la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa'am /
analyzed: gang gis 'di dag yod pa'am med par rtogs par 'gyur ba tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis 'jug pa las sngar dgos pa la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa'am /
translated: But prior to engaging in the treatise, those who see only what is near at hand do not understand whether the purpose and so on exist or do not exist.

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma ni cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma ni cung zad kyang med de /
translated: There is not the slightest valid cognition that establishes the purpose and so on or contradicts it.

original: de ni 'jug pa las rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'jug pa las rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is understood from engaging in the treatise.

original: 'on kyang bstan bcos kyi dgos pa la sogs pa ma rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ngag 'di brtsam par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: 'on kyang bstan bcos kyi dgos pa la sogs pa ma rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ngag 'di brtsam par bya ba yin na /
translated: But if the purpose of the treatise and so on is not understood, then this statement should be composed for that person.

original: rtog pa dang ldan pa de yang ngag 'di las the tshom nyid skye'i /
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan pa de yang ngag 'di las the tshom nyid skye'i /
translated: But even for that person who has such thoughts, doubt arises from this statement,

original: nges ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nges ba ni ma yin te /
translated: but certainty does not arise.

original: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no valid cognition.

original: the tshom de yang dag nye bar bkod pa las sngar yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom de yang dag nye bar bkod pa las sngar yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that doubt is already present prior to the statement of the purpose, etc.

original: dgos pa la sogs pa'i ngag nye bar bkod pa don med pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: dgos pa la sogs pa'i ngag nye bar bkod pa don med pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the statement of the purpose, etc. meaningless?

original: de lta bas na 'di la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di la brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, we must say this:

original: re zhig rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ni nges pa nyid las yin zhing zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni mi bden te /
analyzed: re zhig rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ni nges pa nyid las yin zhing zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni mi bden te /
translated: You said that the engagement of those who have understanding is only from certainty. That is not true,

original: zhing pa la sogs pa bzhin du the tshom las kyang 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhing pa la sogs pa bzhin du the tshom las kyang 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because we see that engagement is also from doubt, as in the case of farmers, etc.

original: 'di snyam du zhing pa la sogs pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'bras bu la the tshom za ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du zhing pa la sogs pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'bras bu la the tshom za ba yin mod kyi /
translated: You may think that farmers, etc. doubt the future result,

original: 'on kyang de dag la 'di'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i nges pa yod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag la 'di'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i nges pa yod pa nyid yin no //
translated: but they have the certainty that the result of that is accomplished.

original: des na de dag nges pa sngon du 'gro bas 'jug go snyam du sems na /
analyzed: des na de dag nges pa sngon du 'gro bas 'jug go snyam du sems na /
translated: Therefore, they engage having certainty beforehand.

original: de ni yang dag pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: 'dir gang zhig gang gi don du 'jug pa de ni de la the tshom za na yang 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de tsam zhig skabs su bab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gang zhig gang gi don du 'jug pa de ni de la the tshom za na yang 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de tsam zhig skabs su bab pa yin no //
translated: Here, it is only this much that is relevant: ‚ÄúWhen someone engages in something for the sake of something else, he engages in it even if he doubts it.‚Äù

original: gang gis sgrub par byed pa'i yul la nges pa srid pa'i phyir nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug par brjod pa zhing pa la sogs sgrub par byed pa'i don du de dag la 'jug pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis sgrub par byed pa'i yul la nges pa srid pa'i phyir nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug par brjod pa zhing pa la sogs sgrub par byed pa'i don du de dag la 'jug pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that farmers, etc. engage in their activities for the sake of establishing a definite object, because it is possible that the object to be established is not definite.

original: 'on ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'on ci zhe na /
translated: What, then, is the case?

original: 'bras bu'i don du de dag de la 'jug la /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i don du de dag de la 'jug la /
translated: They engage in it for the sake of the result.

original: 'bras bu de la gegs byed pa la sogs pa srid pa'i phyir nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu de la gegs byed pa la sogs pa srid pa'i phyir nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But since it is possible that the result is obstructed, etc., it is not definite.

original: de lta bas na de dag the tshom sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyis 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na de dag the tshom sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyis 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, their engagement is due to doubt.

original: yang dang po'i 'jug pa ni sgrub par byed pa nges pa'i don du 'jug pa gang @135a * //
analyzed: yang dang po'i 'jug pa ni sgrub par byed pa nges pa'i don du 'jug pa gang @135a * //
translated: Moreover, the first engagement is the engagement of one who is definite about the object to be established.

original: yin pa de la yang sgrub par byed pa nges pa med de /
analyzed: yin pa de la yang sgrub par byed pa nges pa med de /
translated: But even in that case, the object to be established is not definite.

original: de'i don nyid kyi phyir de la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan yang de dag gi sgrub par byed pa nges pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la ltos nas 'di 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa de lta bu gdon mi za bar sgrub par 'gyur ba yin no zhes de lta bu'i ngo bo yin pa'am /üîΩyang na gegs byed pa dang lhan cig byed pa ma tshang ba med pa yin na gdon mi za bar 'di mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub par nus pa de lta bu'i ngo bo yin grang /üîΩde la re zhig dang po ni rigs pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i don nyid kyi phyir de la 'jug pa'i phyir ro // gzhan yang de dag gi sgrub par byed pa nges pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la ltos nas 'di 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa de lta bu gdon mi za bar sgrub par 'gyur ba yin no zhes de lta bu'i ngo bo yin pa'am / yang na gegs byed pa dang lhan cig byed pa ma tshang ba med pa yin na gdon mi za bar 'di mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub par nus pa de lta bu'i ngo bo yin grang / de la re zhig dang po ni rigs pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
translated: Because it is the meaning of that, it engages that.üîΩMoreover, the ascertainment of their establishment is that the effect that is the object of reliance arises.

original: lhan cig byed pa mtshang ba dang gegs byed pa nye ba srid pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig dmigs kyang s'a lu la sogs pa rnam pa de lta bu'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa la sgrub pa mi byed par mthong bas /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa mtshang ba dang gegs byed pa nye ba srid pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig dmigs kyang s'a lu la sogs pa rnam pa de lta bu'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa la sgrub pa mi byed par mthong bas /
translated: If it is the nature of the effect that is the object of reliance, it is the nature of the effect that is the object of reliance that is the nature of the effect that is the object of original: thams cad du dogs pa mi ldog pa'i phyir te /üîΩtshogs pa'i 'bras bu nus pa rnams //
analyzed: thams cad du dogs pa mi ldog pa'i phyir te / tshogs pa'i 'bras bu nus pa rnams //
translated: because doubt is not eliminated in all cases.üîΩThe effects of the collection of causes and conditions areüîΩthe transformations of the potency

original: 'gyur ba dang 'brel 'bras bu la //
analyzed: 'gyur ba dang 'brel 'bras bu la //
translated: in relation to the effect.

original: ma nges pa ni nyid yin te //
analyzed: ma nges pa ni nyid yin te //
translated: The effect is uncertain,

original: gegs byed pa dag srid phyir ro //
analyzed: gegs byed pa dag srid phyir ro //
translated: because the obstruction is possible.

original: zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is what is explained.

original: ci ste gnyis pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste gnyis pa'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that the second is the effect,

original: de'i tshe 'di ni ches rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'di ni ches rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: then this is not at all reasonable,

original: tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa thams cad ni de lta bu'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa thams cad ni de lta bu'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all engagement that is preceded by valid knowledge has that kind of nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis /
translated: For that very reason, the master DignƒÅga said:üîΩIts suitability is when there is no obstruction.

original: 'di'i rung ba nyid ni gegs byed pa med na'o zhes de ltar rung ba nyid rjes su dpag pa la khyad par smra ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i rung ba nyid ni gegs byed pa med na'o zhes de ltar rung ba nyid rjes su dpag pa la khyad par smra ba yin no //
translated: Thus he states that the inference of suitability has a distinction.

original: 'on kyang 'bras bu yang tshul 'dis nges pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid ni nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'bras bu yang tshul 'dis nges pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid ni nges pa ma yin no //
translated: However, because the effect is also ascertained by this method, it is not certain that it is the proof.

original: de lta bu'i 'jug pa la don dam pa'i 'bras bu nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa 'grub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'jug pa la don dam pa'i 'bras bu nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa 'grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Such engagement is not established as engagement that is preceded by ascertainment of the ultimate result.

original: tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis gegs byed pa la sogs pa med pa nyid nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis gegs byed pa la sogs pa med pa nyid nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because those who see only the near side cannot ascertain the absence of hindrances and so on.

original: 'di snyam du don dam par gegs byed pa med par nges par mi nus mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di snyam du don dam par gegs byed pa med par nges par mi nus mod kyi /
translated: You might think, ‚ÄúI cannot ascertain the absence of hindrances ultimately,

original: 'on kyang gal te gegs byed pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on kyang gal te gegs byed pa med pa yin na /
translated: but if there is no hindrance,

original: de'i tshe nges pa kho nar 'di las 'bras bu thob par nges pa yin no zhes bya ba rnam pa de lta bu nges pa tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa la yod pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe nges pa kho nar 'di las 'bras bu thob par nges pa yin no zhes bya ba rnam pa de lta bu nges pa tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa la yod pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: then it is certain that I will definitely obtain the result from this.‚Äù Such ascertainment exists for engagement that is preceded by valid knowledge,

original: tshad ma ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba can la ni yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba can la ni yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it does not exist for engagement that is preceded by invalid knowledge.

original: de lta ma yin na tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba can dag gi 'jug pa la khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba can dag gi 'jug pa la khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were not so, there would be no difference between engagement that is preceded by valid knowledge and that which is preceded by invalid knowledge.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i nges pa de yang tshig las phyi rol gyi don la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba kho na ste /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i nges pa de yang tshig las phyi rol gyi don la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba kho na ste /
translated: And that ascertainment of that sort does not occur in regard to an external object apart from the words.

original: @135b de dang de la 'brel pa med pas tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: @135b de dang de la 'brel pa med pas tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that it is not a valid cognition because it is not related to that and that,

original: 'di ni bden te /
analyzed: 'di ni bden te /
translated: this is true.

original: 'on kyang gal te tshig las rtogs pa dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig 'jug pa med pa de grub pa yin na de'i tshe de thams cad 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gal te tshig las rtogs pa dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig 'jug pa med pa de grub pa yin na de'i tshe de thams cad 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: But if it is established that someone who understands from the words does not engage, then at that time all of that is so.üîΩTo the extent that the benefit of engaging and turning away in regard to a result that is not directly perceived is great, and the disadvantage of not engaging is great, one who is unable to rely on the valid cognition of scripture remains in a bad state.

original: ji tsam du mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i 'bras bu la 'ga' zhig gi 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i phan yon chen po dang ngan song dag thos pa'i phyir lung gi tshad ma lam brten par gnas par mi nus pa 'ga' zhig dag tshig gi 'jug pa mthong
analyzed: ji tsam du mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i 'bras bu la 'ga' zhig gi 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i phan yon chen po dang ngan song dag thos pa'i phyir lung gi tshad ma lam brten par gnas par mi nus pa 'ga' zhig dag tshig gi 'jug pa mthong
translated: One who sees the engagement of wordsüîΩhears about the great benefit of engaging and turning away in regard to a result that is not directly perceived and the great disadvantage of not engaging.

original: ngo // de tsam gyis ni de dag rtogs pa dang ldan pa las nyams pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ngo // de tsam gyis ni de dag rtogs pa dang ldan pa las nyams pa yang ma yin te /
translated: To that extent, one does not lose the understanding that comes from the words.

original: thabs khyad par can nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs khyad par can nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one engages through a special method.

original: gang gi phyir lung las ma rtogs pa'i shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don gyi yul la 'jug pa'i thabs gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lung las ma rtogs pa'i shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don gyi yul la 'jug pa'i thabs gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Because there is no other means of engaging in the domain of meaning that is extremely hidden, which is not understood from scripture.

original: lung las gdon mi za bar 'jug par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lung las gdon mi za bar 'jug par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One must engage it from scripture without doubt.

original: 'gal ba'i lung yongs su 'dzin par byed pa na rtog pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i lung yongs su 'dzin par byed pa na rtog pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur gyi /
translated: When one holds a scripture that is contradictory, one becomes unreasonable.

original: gnod pa med pa'i lung la brten nas 'jug pa ni ji ltar rtog pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa'i lung la brten nas 'jug pa ni ji ltar rtog pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: But when one engages in it based on a non-contradictory scripture, how can one become unreasonable?

original: de nyid yang dag pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid yang dag pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that itself is the correct means.

original: lung khyad par du 'phags pa'i skyes bus byas pa nyid kyis don ji lta ba bzhin nges par bzung nas de la nges pa nyid kyis 'jug pa yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi rigs te /
analyzed: lung khyad par du 'phags pa'i skyes bus byas pa nyid kyis don ji lta ba bzhin nges par bzung nas de la nges pa nyid kyis 'jug pa yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi rigs te /
translated: It is also unreasonable to say that one engages in it with certainty by ascertaining the meaning just as it is through the scripture composed by a special person, and then with certainty.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i skyes bu nyid tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i skyes bu nyid tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those who see only the near side cannot ascertain the status of a special person.

original: rtog pa dang ldan pa yin na yang lung las mi 'jug pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di la yang gnod pa med pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa'i tshig thos pa las bstan bcos la 'jug pa rnams ni rtog pa dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan pa yin na yang lung las mi 'jug pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di la yang gnod pa med pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa'i tshig thos pa las bstan bcos la 'jug pa rnams ni rtog pa dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur
translated: Likewise, those who enter the treatise after hearing the words of the treatise, which have the purpose of removing the faults of the three kinds of persons, will not be without understanding,

original: te / thabs nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: te / thabs nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they enter by means of the method.

original: 'di la 'jug pa'i thabs gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la 'jug pa'i thabs gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no other method for entering the treatise,

original: 'jug pa las sngar bstan bcos kyi don shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa las sngar bstan bcos kyi don shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meaning of the treatise is extremely obscure before one enters it.

original: tshig ni brjod par 'dod pa la tshad ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa gang yin pa de yang snying po med de /
analyzed: tshig ni brjod par 'dod pa la tshad ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa gang yin pa de yang snying po med de /
translated: As for the statement that the words are valid for one who wishes to express himself, that is also pointless,

original: gang gi phyir ji ltar brjod par 'dod pa'i don la bstan bcos kyis mthar phyin par dmigs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji ltar brjod par 'dod pa'i don la bstan bcos kyis mthar phyin par dmigs so //
translated: because one observes that the treatise brings one to the end in the matter that one wishes to express.

original: de bzhin du 'di la yang res 'ga' ji lta ba zhig du dam bcas pa'i don mthar phyin par 'gyur ba yin no snyam du rig nas rtog pa dang ldan pa 'jug pa gang gis bzlog med par dogs pas @136a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di la yang res 'ga' ji lta ba zhig du dam bcas pa'i don mthar phyin par 'gyur ba yin no snyam du rig nas rtog pa dang ldan pa 'jug pa gang gis bzlog med par dogs pas @136a * //
translated: Likewise, in this case, sometimes one should engage with the thought that the meaning of the thesis will be completed.

original: bzlog par rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bzlog par rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not right to stop,

original: don la the tshom zab las kyang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la the tshom zab las kyang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one engages even when one doubts the meaning.

original: gzhan du na tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa la yang 'bras bu med par dogs pa srid pa'i phyir su yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'jug pa la yang 'bras bu med par dogs pa srid pa'i phyir su yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, even when one engages with valid knowledge in the foreground, it would be possible to doubt that it is fruitless, and no one would engage.

original: gnod pa thob pa'i dogs pas kyang mi 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnod pa thob pa'i dogs pas kyang mi 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: One does not engage because of the doubt that one will obtain a fault.

original: bstan bcos las mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos las mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is impossible to obtain a result that one does not want from a treatise.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'thob pa'i srid pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnod pa thob par dogs pa yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'thob pa'i srid pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gnod pa thob par dogs pa yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te /
translated: One cannot say that it is the doubt that one will obtain a fault that has the characteristic of the possibility of not obtaining the desired result.

original: de ni 'jug pa thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'jug pa thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the same for all the treatises.

original: gang yang bstan bcos kyi dgos pa la sogs pa ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de la ngag 'di brtsam par bya ba yin no zhes gang smras pa kho bo cag kyang de skad du smra'o //
analyzed: gang yang bstan bcos kyi dgos pa la sogs pa ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de la ngag 'di brtsam par bya ba yin no zhes gang smras pa kho bo cag kyang de skad du smra'o //
translated: And as for what you said, ‚ÄúThe statement of the purpose is not included among the parts of the treatise, so it should be placed at the beginning of the text,‚Äù we agree.

original: 'on kyang skyes bu de'i the tshom ni dgos ba'i ngag nye bar bkod pa las gang yang yod mod kyi /üîΩde ni ci 'di dgos pa dang bcas pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'on kyang skyes bu de'i the tshom ni dgos ba'i ngag nye bar bkod pa las gang yang yod mod kyi / de ni ci 'di dgos pa dang bcas pa yin nam /
translated: But the doubt of that person is removed by the statement of the purpose.

original: 'on te ma yin zhes de ni dgos pa'i spyi la yin no //
analyzed: 'on te ma yin zhes de ni dgos pa'i spyi la yin no //
translated: But the doubt is not about the purpose of the treatise, but about whether or not the treatise has a purpose.

original: dgos pa tsam la the tshom za ba las 'jug par rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dgos pa tsam la the tshom za ba las 'jug par rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not reasonable to engage in a treatise out of doubt about the mere possibility of a purpose,

original: thams cad la 'jug pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / dgos pa tsam yang don du gnyer bar byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad la 'jug pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / dgos pa tsam yang don du gnyer bar byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that one would engage in all treatises, and because one would not have ascertained that there is a purpose.

original: 'on kyang so sor nges pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs nye bar len pa'i rgyu dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul can gyi the tshom las 'jug pa mthong ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang so sor nges pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs nye bar len pa'i rgyu dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul can gyi the tshom las 'jug pa mthong ste /
translated: But we do see that people engage in a practice only when they have a doubt about the specific purpose that is the proximate cause of the practice.

original: sgrub pa don du gnyer ba rnams 'ga' zhig kho na la 'jug pa ni dgos pa'i khyad par 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa don du gnyer ba rnams 'ga' zhig kho na la 'jug pa ni dgos pa'i khyad par 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because those who seek to practice do so only when they want a specific purpose.

original: gang gis bstan bcos gzhan yongs su spangs nas so sor nges pa'i bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dgos pa'i tshig las sngar dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul la the tshom skyed pa'i rgyu 'ga' zhig yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis bstan bcos gzhan yongs su spangs nas so sor nges pa'i bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dgos pa'i tshig las sngar dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul la the tshom skyed pa'i rgyu 'ga' zhig yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And there is no reason why someone would abandon other treatises and take up a specific treatise, unless there were some doubt about the specific purpose.

original: 'on te dgos pa'i khyad par don du gnyer ba nyid kyi skyes bu dgos pa'i khyad par la the tshom skye ba'i rgyu sngar yod pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te dgos pa'i khyad par don du gnyer ba nyid kyi skyes bu dgos pa'i khyad par la the tshom skye ba'i rgyu sngar yod pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that people who seek a specific purpose already have a cause for doubt about the specific purpose?

original: 'di ltar dgos pa'i khyad par don du gnyer ba'i yid dang ldan pa ches dang por ci 'di kho bo cag gis mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pas dgos pa dang bcas pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'di ltar dgos pa'i khyad par don du gnyer ba'i yid dang ldan pa ches dang por ci 'di kho bo cag gis mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pas dgos pa dang bcas pa yin nam /
translated: Thus, one who has a mind that seeks a special purpose will first of all think, ‚ÄúDoes this have a purpose that is my goal?

original: ci ste gzhan gyis dgos pa dang bcas sam /
analyzed: ci ste gzhan gyis dgos pa dang bcas sam /
translated: Or does it have a purpose that is someone else‚Äôs goal?

original: 'on te dgos pa med pa yin zhes de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'on te dgos pa med pa yin zhes de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid yin te /
translated: Or is it pointless?‚Äù

original: de'i sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par @136b byed pa'i tshad ma med na de rigs pas thob pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / dgos pa'i khyad par ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos gzhan dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par @136b byed pa'i tshad ma med na de rigs pas thob pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / dgos pa'i khyad par ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos gzhan dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because if there is no valid cognition that establishes it or invalidates it, it is not obtained through reasoning, and because one observes other treatises that teach a special purpose.

original: nges na dgos pa'i khyad par gyis yul la the tshom sngar yang yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'i tshig nye bar bkod pa don med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nges na dgos pa'i khyad par gyis yul la the tshom sngar yang yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'i tshig nye bar bkod pa don med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If one has doubt about the object due to a special purpose, then it is pointless to state the purpose.

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not the case.

original: dgos pa'i khyad par don du gnyer ba yang the tshom gyi khyad par gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: dgos pa'i khyad par don du gnyer ba yang the tshom gyi khyad par gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin mod kyi /
translated: The specific purpose is also the cause of the specific doubt.

original: 'on kyang de thams cad la mngon sum du gyur pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de thams cad la mngon sum du gyur pa ni ma yin te /
translated: However, it is not directly evident to all.

original: skyes bu'i don la mi mkhas pa rmongs ba'i blo can kha cig la mngon du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: skyes bu'i don la mi mkhas pa rmongs ba'i blo can kha cig la mngon du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not evident to some who are confused, whose minds are not skilled in the purpose of human life.

original: 'di ltar thar pa ni skyes bu'i don mchog nyid du grub mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar thar pa ni skyes bu'i don mchog nyid du grub mod kyi /
translated: Thus, liberation is established as the highest purpose of human life.

original: ci ste yang /
analyzed: ci ste yang /
translated: But,

original: gang dag mi mkhas pa kha cig skyes bu'i don gyi mchog de la skyes bu'i don nyid du mi shes pa yod de /
analyzed: gang dag mi mkhas pa kha cig skyes bu'i don gyi mchog de la skyes bu'i don nyid du mi shes pa yod de /
translated: some who are unskilled do not know that to be the highest purpose of human life.

original: de la sngar dang po nyid du don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la sngar dang po nyid du don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not strive for it in the beginning.

original: dgos pa'i khyad par 'dod pa mngon du ma gyur pa rnams ni dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul la the tshom skye ba'i rgyur rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dgos pa'i khyad par 'dod pa mngon du ma gyur pa rnams ni dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul la the tshom skye ba'i rgyur rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not reasonable that those who do not directly perceive the purpose of a specific goal are the cause of doubt about the object of a specific goal.

original: 'bras bu rnams ni rgyu yod pa la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu rnams ni rgyu yod pa la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because effects depend on the existence of a cause.

original: 'ga' zhig gi mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin mod kyi /
translated: Even though it is indeed the case that some of them are directly perceived,

original: 'on kyang sgrub par byed pa gzhan spangs nas so sor nges pa'i sgrub pa nye bar len pa'i rgyu the tshom gyi khyad par gyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang sgrub par byed pa gzhan spangs nas so sor nges pa'i sgrub pa nye bar len pa'i rgyu the tshom gyi khyad par gyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: nevertheless, having abandoned the other means of valid cognition, the means of valid cognition of inference does not become the cause of the ascertainment of a particular effect that is to be established.

original: thams cad sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pas de'i rgyu nyid du rigs pas thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pas de'i rgyu nyid du rigs pas thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not reasonable that it be the cause of that, since there is no means of valid cognition that establishes or refutes everything.

original: de tsam gyis 'jug par rigs ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de tsam gyis 'jug par rigs ba yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not reasonable that one should engage in all of them,

original: thams cad la 'jug par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad la 'jug par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that one would engage in all of them.

original: 'ga' zhig gis kyang thams cad du 'jug par mi nus pa de'i phyir 'bras bu'i khyad par don du gnyer ba rnams kyis kyang so sor nges pa'i sgrub par byed pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan med pas yal bar 'dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis kyang thams cad du 'jug par mi nus pa de'i phyir 'bras bu'i khyad par don du gnyer ba rnams kyis kyang so sor nges pa'i sgrub par byed pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan med pas yal bar 'dor bar bya'o //
translated: And since no one is able to engage in all of them, those who seek a particular effect should also abandon those that are not the cause of that effect, since they are not the cause of that effect.

original: de'i phyir so sor nges pa'i sgrub pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyud dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul la the tshom bskyed pa'i phyir shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don gyi yul la lung byed pa bzhin du 'bras bu'i khyad par don du gnyer ba rnams so sor
analyzed: de'i phyir so sor nges pa'i sgrub pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyud dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul la the tshom bskyed pa'i phyir shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don gyi yul la lung byed pa bzhin du 'bras bu'i khyad par don du gnyer ba rnams so sor
translated: Therefore, in order to generate doubt about the object that is the special purpose of the tantra that is to be upheld by the individual, the special result is stated, just like a scriptural passage that generates doubt about a very hidden object.

original: nges pa'i sgrub pa gzung ba'i phyir dgos pa'i ngag brjod par bya ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: nges pa'i sgrub pa gzung ba'i phyir dgos pa'i ngag brjod par bya ba nyid yin te /
translated: Those who seek the special result should uphold the tantra that is to be upheld by the individual.

original: 'di ltar des ni bstan bcos 'di'i don gyi khyad par bstan gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //üîΩdes na 'dis so sor nges pa'i sgrub pa'i bsgrub bya 'bras bu'i khyad par gyi yul @137a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar des ni bstan bcos 'di'i don gyi khyad par bstan gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no // des na 'dis so sor nges pa'i sgrub pa'i bsgrub bya 'bras bu'i khyad par gyi yul @137a * //
translated: Thus, it teaches the special meaning of this treatise, but not that of others.

original: can gyi the tshom skyed par byed do //
analyzed: can gyi the tshom skyed par byed do //
translated: Therefore, it generates doubt in the mind of the one who seeks the special result that is to be accomplished by the tantra that is to be upheld by the individual.

original: nyan pa po de yang res 'ga' bdag gi don gyi khyad par 'di sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don la lung gis bskyed pa bzhin du dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul can dgos pa'i tshig gis bskyed pa'i the tshom las 'jug pa
analyzed: nyan pa po de yang res 'ga' bdag gi don gyi khyad par 'di sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don la lung gis bskyed pa bzhin du dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul can dgos pa'i tshig gis bskyed pa'i the tshom las 'jug pa
translated: The hearer, too, is like one who is induced by a scripture to believe in a matter that is extremely hidden, when he thinks, ‚ÄúAt some time, I will accomplish this special purpose of mine.‚Äù

original: yang yin pa'i phyir des na dgos pa'i ngag nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: yang yin pa'i phyir des na dgos pa'i ngag nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the statement of the purpose is presented in order to induce the hearer to engage in the matter at hand, by removing his doubt, a doubt that is created by the statement of the purpose, a doubt that has as its object the special purpose.

original: 'di ni gdon mi za bar de lta bu yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gdon mi za bar de lta bu yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: This is how it is, without a doubt.

original: de lta ma yin na shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don gyi yul can la lung byed pa yang don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don gyi yul can la lung byed pa yang don med par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, the statement of the purpose would be meaningless, since it would have as its object a matter that is extremely hidden.

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par don du gnyer ba rnams ni sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med par spyin pa la sogs pa la dang por yang the tshom de yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par don du gnyer ba rnams ni sgrub par byed pa dang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med par spyin pa la sogs pa la dang por yang the tshom de yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those who seek a special result would not, at the outset, doubt the truth of the statement of the purpose, without having a valid cognition that would either prove or disprove it.

original: 'on kyang the tshom ni mtho ris la sogs pa'i 'bras bu la mi mkhas pa rnams la mi skye ba nyid de /
analyzed: 'on kyang the tshom ni mtho ris la sogs pa'i 'bras bu la mi mkhas pa rnams la mi skye ba nyid de /
translated: But doubt does not arise for those who are skilled in the results of high status, etc.

original: de'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par don du gnyer ba mngon du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par don du gnyer ba mngon du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not seek the special results that would be the cause of doubt.

original: gang dag la skye ba de dag la yang rdo la sogs pa za ba thams cad du yang 'jug pa rgyu nyid du thams cad du thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang dag la skye ba de dag la yang rdo la sogs pa za ba thams cad du yang 'jug pa rgyu nyid du thams cad du thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And for those in whom it does arise, it does not arise in all cases, such as when eating stones, because the cause is not common to all cases.

original: de yongs su spangs nas spyin pa la sogs pa so sor nges par yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i don du lung byed pa po rnams kyis byed pa de bzhin du bstan bcos byed pa rnams kyis dgos pa'i ngag kyang bkod pa'i phyir
analyzed: de yongs su spangs nas spyin pa la sogs pa so sor nges par yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i don du lung byed pa po rnams kyis byed pa de bzhin du bstan bcos byed pa rnams kyis dgos pa'i ngag kyang bkod pa'i phyir
translated: Therefore, having abandoned that, they think, ‚ÄúIt will not be the cause for retaining generosity, etc., individually,‚Äù and for that purpose they compose treatises.

original: glan ka 'di med do //
analyzed: glan ka 'di med do //
translated: Therefore, this is not a fault.

original: gang gis de dmigs pa'i stobs kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul la the tshom du gyur pa shes par 'dod pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos gzhan dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis de dmigs pa'i stobs kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par gyi yul la the tshom du gyur pa shes par 'dod pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par ston par byed pa'i bstan bcos gzhan dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is there any other treatise that one could consult, which would show the special purpose that one desires to know, by the power of observing which one would know the special purpose that one desires.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par sgrub pa'i bstan bcos gzhan srid pa yin na rtog pa dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig bstan bcos gzhan rtsom pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par sgrub pa'i bstan bcos gzhan srid pa yin na rtog pa dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig bstan bcos gzhan rtsom pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If there were another treatise that established the special purpose that one desires, then some intelligent person would compose that other treatise.

original: rtog pa dang ldan pa nyid nyams par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan pa nyid nyams par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: But it would follow, absurdly, that the intelligent person would lose his intelligence.

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos gzhan dmigs na yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par la the tshom gyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos gzhan dmigs na yang brjod par 'dod pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par la the tshom gyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, even if one were to consult another treatise, it would not serve as a cause for the elimination of doubt with regard to the special purpose that one desires.

original: de lta bas na nyan pa po'i skye po 'jug par bya ba'i don du dgos pa la sogs pa'i ngag nye bar bkod do zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: de lta bas na nyan pa po'i skye po 'jug par bya ba'i don du dgos pa la sogs pa'i ngag nye bar bkod do zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: Therefore, it is for the sake of engaging the audience that the purpose and so on are stated.

original: gang yang nyan pa po'i skye bo 'jug pa'i don du dgos pa la sogs pa brjod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang nyan pa po'i skye bo 'jug pa'i don du dgos pa la sogs pa brjod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not for the sake of stating the purpose and so on in order to engage the audience.

original: de las the tshom skye ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: de las the tshom skye ba'i phyir la /
translated: Because doubt arises from that.

original: @137b rtog pa dang ldan pa the tshom gyis 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @137b rtog pa dang ldan pa the tshom gyis 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for the intelligent to engage with doubt.

original: 'on kyang gang dgos pa dang bral ba'am /
analyzed: 'on kyang gang dgos pa dang bral ba'am /
translated: However, that which is devoid of purpose

original: don med pa de ni brtsam par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: don med pa de ni brtsam par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: or meaningless should not be undertaken.

original: dper na bya rog gi so brtag pa dang smyon pa la sogs pa'i tshig bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bya rog gi so brtag pa dang smyon pa la sogs pa'i tshig bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the examination of a crow's teeth or the words of a madman and so on.

original: bstan bcos 'di yang dgos pa dang bral ba yin no //üîΩdes na mnyan pa'am bya ba brtsam par mi bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas rtsod par byed pa gang yin pa de'i gtan tshigs ma grub par bstan par bya ba'i don du dang por dgos pa la sogs pa'i ngag nye
analyzed: bstan bcos 'di yang dgos pa dang bral ba yin no // des na mnyan pa'am bya ba brtsam par mi bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas rtsod par byed pa gang yin pa de'i gtan tshigs ma grub par bstan par bya ba'i don du dang por dgos pa la sogs pa'i ngag nye
translated: And this treatise is devoid of purpose.üîΩTherefore, one should not listen to it or undertake its composition.

original: bar bkod pa yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: bar bkod pa yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: If one thinks in this way, that such a pervasion is not observed, and that the reason for the dispute is taught to be unestablished, then in order to demonstrate that, the statement of purpose and so on is first arranged.

original: de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa lta bur mngon te the tshom gyis kyang 'jug pa nyid bsgrubs zin pa'i phyir dang / ma grub par bstan pa don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa lta bur mngon te the tshom gyis kyang 'jug pa nyid bsgrubs zin pa'i phyir dang / ma grub par bstan pa don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is as if it were not right, because doubt also establishes engagement, and because it is pointless to teach nonestablishment.

original: gal te pha rol po de tshig 'di las 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta na de don dang ldan par 'gyur ro //üîΩgang gis 'di 'jug par 'gyur ba'i ji tsam du ngag 'dis ma grub pa brjod du zin kyang rtog pa dang ldan pa tshig 'di las ji skad du bshad pa'i khyad par byed pa yod pa nyid la nges pa skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te pha rol po de tshig 'di las 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta na de don dang ldan par 'gyur ro // gang gis 'di 'jug par 'gyur ba'i ji tsam du ngag 'dis ma grub pa brjod du zin kyang rtog pa dang ldan pa tshig 'di las ji skad du bshad pa'i khyad par byed pa yod pa nyid la nges pa skye ba ma yin te /
translated: If the opponent were to engage in this statement, then it would have a point.

original: snga ma bzhin du tshig ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang / khyed kyi lugs kyis the tshom gyis kyang rtog pa sngon du gtong ba 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du tshig ma ma yin pa'i phyir dang / khyed kyi lugs kyis the tshom gyis kyang rtog pa sngon du gtong ba 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But no matter how much this statement expresses nonestablishment, a rational being does not generate certainty in the existence of the property of the position from this statement, because, as before, the statement is not established, and because, according to your system, it is impossible for doubt to engage in the prior inquiry.

original: de'i phyir ma grub par bstan pa 'bras bu med pa nyid yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir ma grub par bstan pa 'bras bu med pa nyid yin no ;
translated: Therefore teaching nonestablishment is pointless.

original: / rtog pa dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig bstan bcos kyi lung mi shes pa glo bur du khyab par byed pa med par nges te /
analyzed: / rtog pa dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig bstan bcos kyi lung mi shes pa glo bur du khyab par byed pa med par nges te /
translated: Someone who is imaginative might suddenly decide, without any reason, that the scriptures of the treatises are not authoritative.

original: gong gi rigs pa 'dis phyir rgol ba gzhan pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gong gi rigs pa 'dis phyir rgol ba gzhan pa yang ma yin no //
translated: This argument also applies to other opponents.

original: gang gis de dag 'jug pa'i don du ma grub pa brjod par bya bar 'gyur ba de la phyir rgol ba 'god pa'i phyir rang nyid kyis bstan bcos kyi dgos pa shes pa yang bstan bcos byed par rtsom pa'am /
analyzed: gang gis de dag 'jug pa'i don du ma grub pa brjod par bya bar 'gyur ba de la phyir rgol ba 'god pa'i phyir rang nyid kyis bstan bcos kyi dgos pa shes pa yang bstan bcos byed par rtsom pa'am /
translated: Since the purpose of the treatise is not established for them, the author of the treatise would not undertake to compose it in order to set forth a response to their objections.

original: nyan pa po rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir rgol lan gdab rin mo chog gi ngag las ldog pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: nyan pa po rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir rgol lan gdab rin mo chog gi ngag las ldog pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor would the listener, who would not be imaginative, turn away from the treatise without any reason.

original: ci ste yang rtog pa son du mi gtong ba gang yin pa de glo bur du rgyu mtshan dang bcas par yang ji skad du bshad pa'i khyad par byed pa med pa len cing gzhan dag kyang len du 'jug ste /
analyzed: ci ste yang rtog pa son du mi gtong ba gang yin pa de glo bur du rgyu mtshan dang bcas par yang ji skad du bshad pa'i khyad par byed pa med pa len cing gzhan dag kyang len du 'jug ste /
translated: But if someone who is not imaginative suddenly decides, for some reason, to take up the treatise, he would take up the treatise as it has been explained, without any reservations, and would make others take it up in the same way.

original: de'i phyir de la ma grub par bstan par bya'o snyam na de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de la ma grub par bstan par bya'o snyam na de yang mi rigs te /
translated: Therefore, we think that we will show that it is not established for you.üîΩBut that is not correct.

original: gal te de ngag de dag bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa de'i tshe de la ma grub par bstan pa dgos pa med pa nyid de /üîΩde lta ma yin te ha cang @138a * //
analyzed: gal te de ngag de dag bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa de'i tshe de la ma grub par bstan pa dgos pa med pa nyid de / de lta ma yin te ha cang @138a * //
translated: If you say that those are not branches of engaging the treatise, then it is pointless to show that it is not established for you.

original: thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow that it is completely pointless.

original: 'di ltar kha cig 'brel pa med pa ches mang du smra ba yang yod de /
analyzed: 'di ltar kha cig 'brel pa med pa ches mang du smra ba yang yod de /
translated: In the same way, some speak a great deal that is completely irrelevant.

original: de dag la yang mi rigs pa brjod pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i nye bar mi mkho ba ches mang po dag kyang brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag la yang mi rigs pa brjod pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i nye bar mi mkho ba ches mang po dag kyang brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
translated: And in order to show that it is incorrect, one would have to say that it is completely irrelevant to engaging the treatise.

original: de lta bas na gdon mi za bar bstan bcos brtsam pa la gtan tshigs ma grub par bstan pa 'di ni 'bras bu med pa dang / ha cang thal bar 'gyur du 'ongs pas de ltar na 'bras bu ni nyan pa'i skye bo 'jug pa nyid yin par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na gdon mi za bar bstan bcos brtsam pa la gtan tshigs ma grub par bstan pa 'di ni 'bras bu med pa dang / ha cang thal bar 'gyur du 'ongs pas de ltar na 'bras bu ni nyan pa'i skye bo 'jug pa nyid yin par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the statement that the reason for composing the treatise is unestablished is fruitless, and it is absurd. Thus, the result should be stated to be the engagement of the audience.

original: de lta bas na gang yang khyab bar byed pa mi dmigs pas mi rtsod pa dang ; dgos pa ma thob par mi 'jug pa de la ci'i phyir don dang bcas par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta bas na gang yang khyab bar byed pa mi dmigs pas mi rtsod pa dang ; dgos pa ma thob par mi 'jug pa de la ci'i phyir don dang bcas par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, since the pervader is not perceived, there is no dispute, and there is no engagement without obtaining the purpose. Why would it not be meaningful?

original: ji skad du sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad du sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: As it was previously explained.

original: de lta bas na nyan pa po'i skye bo 'jug pa'i don du brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bstan to zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: de lta bas na nyan pa po'i skye bo 'jug pa'i don du brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bstan to zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: Therefore, the statement of the purpose, etc. is taught for the purpose of engaging the audience.

original: rang gi don du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi don du yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not even for one's own sake,

original: de las rang nyid mi 'jug ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las rang nyid mi 'jug ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because one does not engage in it oneself.

original: de lta ma yin na smyon pa'i smre sngags la sogs pa bzhin du 'brel pa med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na smyon pa'i smre sngags la sogs pa bzhin du 'brel pa med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be like the lamentations of a madman, and would be completely unrelated.

original: gang yang slob dpon gyis rigs pa'i thigs pa rang nyid kyang de ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhes bsams nas /
analyzed: gang yang slob dpon gyis rigs pa'i thigs pa rang nyid kyang de ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhes bsams nas /
translated: Also, the master [Dharmakƒ´rti] himself, thinking that one should understand this,

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la yang sbyor ba 'di yin no zhes bshad pa de yang phyi rol gyi sbyor ba'i dbang du byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la yang sbyor ba 'di yin no zhes bshad pa de yang phyi rol gyi sbyor ba'i dbang du byas pa ma yin no //
translated: stated that this is the syllogism even in the case of an inference for one‚Äôs own sake. But that is not from the point of view of an external syllogism.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it from the point of view of?

original: nang du brjod pa'i bdag nyid kho na yin te /
analyzed: nang du brjod pa'i bdag nyid kho na yin te /
translated: It is from the point of view of the internal expression of the self.

original: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa ni shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because an inference for one‚Äôs own sake is of the nature of consciousness.

original: gang yang skye bo phal cher phal la chags shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa de yang gzhan dag phrag dog la sogs pa'i dri mas nyams pa'i yid can snod du bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: gang yang skye bo phal cher phal la chags shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa de yang gzhan dag phrag dog la sogs pa'i dri mas nyams pa'i yid can snod du bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin te /
translated: Also, the statement ‚ÄúMost people are attached to the ordinary‚Äù and so on is stated for the purpose of making others vessels by purifying their minds of the stains of jealousy and so on.

original: spros pas chog go //
analyzed: spros pas chog go //
translated: Enough of this elaboration.

original: ston pa la mchod par byed pa ni legs pa thams cad thob pa'i rgyu bcom ldan 'das la dang ba bskyed pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: ston pa la mchod par byed pa ni legs pa thams cad thob pa'i rgyu bcom ldan 'das la dang ba bskyed pa'i don du ste /
translated: The worship of the Teacher is for the purpose of generating faith in the Lord, which is the cause of obtaining all that is good.

original: 'di ltar yon tan brjod pa'i sgo nas mchod pa byas pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'i bdag nyid khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar yon tan brjod pa'i sgo nas mchod pa byas pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'i bdag nyid khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa ston par byed do //
translated: Thus, by making worship through the expression of good qualities, the greatness of the Lord is shown to be endowed with special excellence.

original: de thos nas kyang re zhig dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni the tshom med par myur du bcom ldan 'das la dang ba skye'o //
analyzed: de thos nas kyang re zhig dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni the tshom med par myur du bcom ldan 'das la dang ba skye'o //
translated: Having heard that, those who are followers of faith will quickly generate faith in the Lord without doubt.

original: gang yang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba de dag kyang de lta bu la gnod pa ma mthong ste /
analyzed: gang yang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba de dag kyang de lta bu la gnod pa ma mthong ste /
translated: And those who are followers of reality will not see any harm in that.

original: shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan goms pas @138b khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dbang po las 'das pa'i don du sgrub par byed pa'i tshad mas rnam pa de lta bu'i mkhas par 'gro ba ni srid par nges so snyam du nges par bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la dang ba skyed par byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan goms pas @138b khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dbang po las 'das pa'i don du sgrub par byed pa'i tshad mas rnam pa de lta bu'i mkhas par 'gro ba ni srid par nges so snyam du nges par bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la dang ba skyed par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: and that it is certain that one will become learned in the way of the path by means of the valid cognitions that establish the meaning beyond the scope of the senses, as will be explained.

original: de la dang bas kyang de'i yon tan mngon par 'dod pa rnams de'i gsung rab dang / de la brten pa'i bstan bcos la sogs pa la brtag pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i don du gus par byed do //
analyzed: de la dang bas kyang de'i yon tan mngon par 'dod pa rnams de'i gsung rab dang / de la brten pa'i bstan bcos la sogs pa la brtag pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i don du gus par byed do //
translated: With faith, those who desire his qualities will respect the scriptures of the Buddha and the treatises that depend on them and so forth, in order to apprehend them and so forth, preceded by investigation.

original: de las thos ba las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes rab skye ba'i rim gyis legs pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ba'i phyir chen po dag la dang ba ni legs pa thams cad thob pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin no //
analyzed: de las thos ba las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes rab skye ba'i rim gyis legs pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ba'i phyir chen po dag la dang ba ni legs pa thams cad thob pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin no //
translated: Therefore, faith in the great ones is the principal cause for attaining all that is good.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bstan bcos byed pa phal cher ston pa po rab tu grags pa la brten nas /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bstan bcos byed pa phal cher ston pa po rab tu grags pa la brten nas /
translated: For that very reason, most treatise-makers, relying on the well-known teacher,

original: bstan bcos byed pa la bstan bcos kyi dang por re zhig rang gi ston pa la mchod pa byed pa yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa la bstan bcos kyi dang por re zhig rang gi ston pa la mchod pa byed pa yin te /
translated: at the beginning of the treatise, first make offerings to their own teacher.

original: de ni de la 'jug pa'i yan lag gi cha tsam yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni de la 'jug pa'i yan lag gi cha tsam yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is merely a part of the limb for engaging in that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir de la phyag 'tshal ba rtsom mo zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bstan bcos byed par 'dod pas rang gi ston pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir de la phyag 'tshal ba rtsom mo zhes bshad do //
translated: For that very reason, one who wishes to compose a treatise begins by paying homage to him in order to make known the greatness of his own teacher.

original: de lta na ston pa la mchod par byed pa ni don med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ston pa la mchod par byed pa ni don med pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, making offerings to the teacher is not meaningless.

original: de la phyag 'tshal nas shes bya ba'i bar gyis ni ston pa la mchod par brjod pa bstan to //üîΩde kho na nyid bsdu ba bya //
analyzed: de la phyag 'tshal nas shes bya ba'i bar gyis ni ston pa la mchod par brjod pa bstan to // de kho na nyid bsdu ba bya //
translated: Having paid homage to him, up to the knowable, he has explained the worship of the teacher.üîΩThe summary of reality

original: zhes pa 'dis ni brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa gnyis bstan te /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis ni brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa gnyis bstan te /
translated: This shows both the subject matter and the purpose.

original: 'di ltar bstan bcos 'di'i brjod par bya ba ni rang bzhin la sogs pa'i byed pa dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi de kho na la sogs pa'i byed pa dang bral ba nyid
analyzed: 'di ltar bstan bcos 'di'i brjod par bya ba ni rang bzhin la sogs pa'i byed pa dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi de kho na la sogs pa'i byed pa dang bral ba nyid
translated: Thus, the subject matter of this treatise is the reality free from the activity of intrinsic reality and so on, which is characterized by the special dependent origination of reality and so on, free from activity.

original: yin no // de dag kyang de kho na nyid kyi sgras shugs kyis bstan pa kho na ste /
analyzed: yin no // de dag kyang de kho na nyid kyi sgras shugs kyis bstan pa kho na ste /
translated: And those are only implicitly indicated by the word reality,

original: gzhan dag ni de kho na nyid kyi don nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni de kho na nyid kyi don nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because others are not tenable as the meaning of reality.

original: 'on te ngag nyid brjod par bya ba dang ldan pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te ngag nyid brjod par bya ba dang ldan pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn't it logical that speech alone has a subject matter and not others?

original: bstan bcos mtha' dag ni dag ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bstan bcos mtha' dag ni dag ma yin gyi /
translated: All treatises are collections of words.

original: 'on kyang ngag gi tshogs yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang ngag gi tshogs yin no //
translated: But they are not collections of words alone.

original: des na 'di la brjod par bya ba gal srid ce na /
analyzed: des na 'di la brjod par bya ba gal srid ce na /
translated: If you ask what is the subject matter of treatises,

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: it does not exist.

original: ngag tshogs pa'i bdag nyid bstan bcos yin mod kyi /
analyzed: ngag tshogs pa'i bdag nyid bstan bcos yin mod kyi /
translated: A treatise is a collection of words.

original: 'on kyang ngag de ni phan tshun ltos nas @139a * //üîΩ'brel par gnas te /
analyzed: 'on kyang ngag de ni phan tshun ltos nas @139a * // 'brel par gnas te /
translated: But those words are related to one another.

original: de lta ma yin na smyon pa la sogs pa'i tshig gi tshogs bzhin du don 'brel pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na smyon pa la sogs pa'i tshig gi tshogs bzhin du don 'brel pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, like the words of a madman, they would have no connection.

original: de lta bas na phan tshun 'brel pa can sgra du ma tshogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i ngag bzhin du bstan bcos ni ngag nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na phan tshun 'brel pa can sgra du ma tshogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i ngag bzhin du bstan bcos ni ngag nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is a collection of many words that are mutually related, a treatise is a collection of words, like any other collection of words.

original: tshig kho nas ngag rtsom pa yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshig kho nas ngag rtsom pa yang ma yin gyi /
translated: But a treatise is not composed of words alone.

original: 'on kyang ngag gis kyang rtsom pa yin pa de bas na bstan bcos ni dag chen po yin pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir klan ka med do //
analyzed: 'on kyang ngag gis kyang rtsom pa yin pa de bas na bstan bcos ni dag chen po yin pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir klan ka med do //
translated: However, since it is also composed verbally, the treatise is not open to criticism, because it is a great purification and because it possesses something to be expressed.

original: dgos pa ni bsdus pa'i tshig gis bstan te /
analyzed: dgos pa ni bsdus pa'i tshig gis bstan te /
translated: The purpose is indicated by the words ‚Äúin brief.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar bstan bcos la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyi dgos pa nye bar bstan pa na de ltar gtogs pa nyid bstan par bya'i /
analyzed: 'di ltar bstan bcos la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyi dgos pa nye bar bstan pa na de ltar gtogs pa nyid bstan par bya'i /
translated: Thus, when the purpose is taught for those who wish to engage the treatise, they will be taught to engage it in that way.

original: gzhan du gtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du gtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: They will not engage it in some other way.

original: de lta ma yin na smra ba po 'brel pa med pa brjod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na smra ba po 'brel pa med pa brjod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the author would be guilty of irrelevant speech.

original: smra ba po bstan bcos la sogs pa'i dgos pa brjod pa yang bstan bcos la gzhan dag gzhug par 'dod pas yin gyi zhes pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: smra ba po bstan bcos la sogs pa'i dgos pa brjod pa yang bstan bcos la gzhan dag gzhug par 'dod pas yin gyi zhes pas ni ma yin no //
translated: The author‚Äôs statement of the purpose of the treatise, etc., is for the sake of engaging others in the treatise, not for the sake of himself.

original: ji ltar na gzhan dag dgos pa bstan pas bstan bcos la 'jug par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ji ltar na gzhan dag dgos pa bstan pas bstan bcos la 'jug par 'gyur ba /
translated: How is it that others will engage the treatise through the statement of its purpose?

original: gal te der gtogs pa nyid kyi dgos pa brjod pa yin gyi gzhan du gtogs pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te der gtogs pa nyid kyi dgos pa brjod pa yin gyi gzhan du gtogs pas ni ma yin no //
translated: If the purpose is stated as belonging to that, it is not stated as belonging to something else.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi dgos pa brjod pas rtog pa dang ldan pa gzhan la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan gyi dgos pa brjod pas rtog pa dang ldan pa gzhan la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: For it is not the case that a rational person engages in something else by stating the purpose of something else.

original: khyad par can gyi don ston par nus pa'i tshig ni bstan bcos su brjod kyi //üîΩbrjod par bya btsam yang ston pa lhur len pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi don ston par nus pa'i tshig ni bstan bcos su brjod kyi // brjod par bya btsam yang ston pa lhur len pa ni ma yin la /
