analyzed: 'di ni rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is the demonstration of the contradiction with your own words.

original: 'di ltar nges pa bskyed pa'i don du sgrub byed smra ba na nges pa yang med pa skye ba khas blangs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar nges pa bskyed pa'i don du sgrub byed smra ba na nges pa yang med pa skye ba khas blangs pa yin la /
translated: In this way, when you state a proof in order to generate ascertainment, you accept the arising of non-ascertainment.

original: 'bras bu yod pa yin no zhes kyang dam bcas nas /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod pa yin no zhes kyang dam bcas nas /
translated: And you also assert that the effect exists.

original: de bkag pa'i phyir rang gi tshig dang 'gal lo //üîΩci ste sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba don med par 'gyur du 'ong bas nges pa yang dag pa ma yin pa de med pa nyid sgrub par byed pa las skye'o zhes khas blangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bkag pa'i phyir rang gi tshig dang 'gal lo // ci ste sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba don med par 'gyur du 'ong bas nges pa yang dag pa ma yin pa de med pa nyid sgrub par byed pa las skye'o zhes khas blangs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because you refute that, you contradict your own words.üîΩBut if you say, ‚ÄúIn order to avoid the consequence that the statement of the proof would be pointless, we accept that non-ascertainment arises from the proof of nonexistence,‚Äù

original: de lta na 'o na med pa mi byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi tshogs mtha' dag ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na med pa mi byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi tshogs mtha' dag ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: then in that case, the entire collection of reasons such as ‚Äúbecause it does not make nonexistence‚Äù would be uncertain.

original: nges pa bzhin du med pa yang skye ba 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa bzhin du med pa yang skye ba 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not contradictory for what definitely does not exist to arise.üîΩTherefore, just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.üîΩJust as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar nges pa med kyang byed pa dang / ji ltar de bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i khyad par len pa dang / ji ltar de sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba la sogs pa thams cad las 'byung ba ma yin pa dang /üîΩji ltar 'di med na yang nus pa'i rgyu dag @156b gis byed pa dang / ji ltar de la rgyu rnams kyi byed pa yod pa de bzhin du gzhan la yang 'gyur ro //üîΩci ste sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba las sngar nges pa yod pa yin mod kyi /üîΩ'on kyang sgrub par byed pa don med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar nges pa med kyang byed pa dang / ji ltar de bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i khyad par len pa dang / ji ltar de sgrub par byed pa ltar snang ba la sogs pa thams cad las 'byung ba ma yin pa dang / ji ltar 'di med na yang nus pa'i rgyu dag @156b gis byed pa dang / ji ltar de la rgyu rnams kyi byed pa yod pa de bzhin du gzhan la yang 'gyur ro // ci ste sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba las sngar nges pa yod pa yin mod kyi / 'on kyang sgrub par byed pa don med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.üîΩJust as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.üîΩJust as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.üîΩJust as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.üîΩJust as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.üîΩJust as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.üîΩJust as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.üîΩJust as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.

original: 'di ltar de 'di sngar mngon par mi gsal ba las phyis sgrub par byed pa de dag las mngon par gsal bar sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar de 'di sngar mngon par mi gsal ba las phyis sgrub par byed pa de dag las mngon par gsal bar sgrub par byed do //
translated: Just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite; just as it is not definite, it is produced; just as it is produced, it is not definite.

original: de'i phyir mngon par gsal bar bya ba'i don du sgrub par byed pa'i bya ba yod pas 'di dag don med pa ma yin no snyam du bsams na /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon par gsal bar bya ba'i don du sgrub par byed pa'i bya ba yod pas 'di dag don med pa ma yin no snyam du bsams na /
translated: Therefore, since the activity of the agent exists for the sake of manifesting the object, these are not purposeless.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is illogical.

original: gsal ba ma grub pa ri phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba ma grub pa ri phyir ro //
translated: Because the manifest is not established.

original: 'di ltar gsal pa rang bzhin gyi khyad par skyed pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar gsal pa rang bzhin gyi khyad par skyed pa'am /
translated: In this way, the manifest is either the generation of a particular intrinsic reality,

original: yang na de'i yul can gyi shes pa'am /
analyzed: yang na de'i yul can gyi shes pa'am /
translated: or it is the consciousness that has that as its object,

original: de la dmigs pa'i sgrib pa bsal ba yin grang /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i sgrib pa bsal ba yin grang /
translated: or it is the removal of the obscuration that focuses on that.

original: de la re zhig rang bzhin gyi khyad par bskyed pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar rang bzhin gyi khyad par 'di nges pa'i rang gi ngo bo las tha mi dad pa 'am /
analyzed: de la re zhig rang bzhin gyi khyad par bskyed pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar rang bzhin gyi khyad par 'di nges pa'i rang gi ngo bo las tha mi dad pa 'am /
translated: First, it is not the generation of a particular intrinsic reality. In this way, this particular intrinsic reality is either not different from the intrinsic reality of the object to be ascertained,

original: tha dad par gyur pa zhig yin grang /
analyzed: tha dad par gyur pa zhig yin grang /
translated: or it is different.

original: gal te tha mi dad pa yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te tha mi dad pa yin na de'i tshe /
translated: If it is not different, then at that time,

original: de ni nges pa las dbyer med pas tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni nges pa las dbyer med pas tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
translated: since it is inseparable from the ascertained object, it is not different.

original: nges pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du thams cad du gnas pas skye bar mi rigs so //
analyzed: nges pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du thams cad du gnas pas skye bar mi rigs so //
translated: Like the intrinsic reality of the ascertained object, it is illogical that it arises because it always exists.

original: ci ste tha dad pa yin na /
analyzed: ci ste tha dad pa yin na /
translated: If they are different,

original: de lta na yang de'i 'di zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa mi 'thad do //üîΩ'di ltar rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yin nam /
analyzed: de lta na yang de'i 'di zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa mi 'thad do // 'di ltar rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yin nam /
translated: then even so, the relation of this to that is not tenable.üîΩFor, is the relation that of support and supported,

original: bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yin /üîΩre zhig dang po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yin / re zhig dang po ni ma yin te /
translated: or is it the relation of that which is produced and that which produces?üîΩFirst, it is not the relation of support and supported,

original: phan tshun phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa la de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa la de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that does not exist for that which is not mutually supportive.

original: phan pa yin na yang phan 'dogs par byed pa de tha dad pa nyid yin na 'brel pa ma zub cing thug pa med pa thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan pa yin na yang phan 'dogs par byed pa de tha dad pa nyid yin na 'brel pa ma zub cing thug pa med pa thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if there is support, if that which supports is different, then there is the fault of an endless regress of relations, since the relation is not severed.

original: tha mi dad na yang sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba don med de /
analyzed: tha mi dad na yang sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba don med de /
translated: If it is not different, then the application of the proof is pointless,

original: nges pa nyid las phan gdags par bya ba tha mi dad pa'i khyad par skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa nyid las phan gdags par bya ba tha mi dad pa'i khyad par skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the difference of that which is supported, which is not different, is produced from the very ascertainment.

original: lus can ma yin pa'i phyir khyad par thur du ltung ba med pa'i phyir de la rten 'ga' zhig rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa'i phyir khyad par thur du ltung ba med pa'i phyir de la rten 'ga' zhig rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: and because it is not a body, it does not fall down.

original: 'og tu ltung ba'i gegs byed pa nyid kyis rten du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'og tu ltung ba'i gegs byed pa nyid kyis rten du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not reasonable that it has any support, because it is posited as a support only through preventing falling down.

original: bskyed bya skyed byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yang med de /
analyzed: bskyed bya skyed byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yang med de /
translated: Nor is there a relationship of producer and produced,

original: thams cad du nges pa zhes bya ba'i rgyu nye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: thams cad du nges pa zhes bya ba'i rgyu nye ba'i phyir /
translated: because it is always the cause of what is called ‚Äúcertainty.‚Äù

original: khyad par rtag tu skyed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩsgrub par @157a * //
analyzed: khyad par rtag tu skyed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // sgrub par @157a * //
translated: It follows that it always produces a specific effect.

original: byed pa'i sbyor ba la ltos nas nges pa khyad par skyed par byed pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: byed pa'i sbyor ba la ltos nas nges pa khyad par skyed par byed pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable that it produces a specific effect in dependence on the application that establishes it,

original: phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa la ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa la ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not suitable to depend on that which does not benefit.

original: phan 'dogs na yang gong du skyon snga ma bzhin dang / thug pa med do //
analyzed: phan 'dogs na yang gong du skyon snga ma bzhin dang / thug pa med do //
translated: If it does benefit, then as before there is the error that it is infinite, and there is no end.

original: gzhan yang khyad par gang yin pa 'di tha dad par gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: gzhan yang khyad par gang yin pa 'di tha dad par gyur pa yin na /
translated: Moreover, if this specific effect is different,

original: de ci med pa zhig gam /
analyzed: de ci med pa zhig gam /
translated: Are they non-existent or existent?

original: 'on te yod pa zhig ces bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis po 'di yang 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te yod pa zhig ces bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis po 'di yang 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: These two kinds of conceptualization also occur.

original: de la med pa yin na snga ma bzhin du sgrub par byed pa rnams ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de la med pa yin na snga ma bzhin du sgrub par byed pa rnams ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: If they are non-existent, then, as before, the proofs are indeterminate.

original: yod na yang sgrub par byed pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod na yang sgrub par byed pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are existent, then the proofs are pointless.

original: de la yang mngon par gsal bar 'dod pa na mngon par gsal ba 'di yang ci zhig ces thug pa med par thal ba bzlog par dka'o //
analyzed: de la yang mngon par gsal bar 'dod pa na mngon par gsal ba 'di yang ci zhig ces thug pa med par thal ba bzlog par dka'o //
translated: Moreover, if you assert that they are manifest, then it is difficult to avoid the infinite regress that asks, ‚ÄúWhat is the manifest?‚Äù

original: de lta bas na tha dad pa'i phyogs la yang ma 'brel ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de lta bas na tha dad pa'i phyogs la yang ma 'brel ba'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, even in the case of a different position, it is not tenable that a specific nature is produced because there is no connection.

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ngo bo'i khyad par skyed par mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ngo bo'i khyad par skyed par mi rigs so //
translated: It is not tenable that a specific nature is produced because there is no connection.

original: de'i yul la shes pa skyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsal bar rigs pa ma yin te de'i yul rig pa ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de'i yul la shes pa skyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsal bar rigs pa ma yin te de'i yul rig pa ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: It is also not tenable that the object of that consciousness is manifest because the object of that consciousness is always known.

original: 'di ltar de'i yul yang dag par rig pa gang yin pa de 'bras bu yod par smra ba khyed cag gi lugs kyis rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de ci zhig bskyed par bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i yul yang dag par rig pa gang yin pa de 'bras bu yod par smra ba khyed cag gi lugs kyis rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de ci zhig bskyed par bya bar 'gyur /
translated: Thus, since the object of that cognition is permanent in your system, which advocates the existence of effects, what would it generate?

original: dmigs pa gnyis pa mi srid pa'i phyir yang /
analyzed: dmigs pa gnyis pa mi srid pa'i phyir yang /
translated: Also, because a second object is impossible,

original: de'i yul can gyi shes pa skyed pa yang mngon par gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i yul can gyi shes pa skyed pa yang mngon par gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du mi rigs so //
translated: it is also clearly unreasonable that the cognition that has that as its object has the characteristic of manifestation.

original: yang gi sgra ni sdud pa dang / rim pa gzhan du sbyar ba ste /
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni sdud pa dang / rim pa gzhan du sbyar ba ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used to include and to apply in a different order.

original: mi srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i 'og tu blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i 'og tu blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be seen after ‚Äúbecause it is impossible.‚Äù

original: des na 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: des na 'di skad du bstan pa yin te /
translated: Therefore this is taught:üîΩThe mind is one from the time of expansion until the time of contraction.

original: spro ba nas sdud pa'i bar du blo ni gcig yin no zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir khyed cag gi lugs kyis rig pa ni gcig nyid yin pa la de nyid nges pa yin te /
analyzed: spro ba nas sdud pa'i bar du blo ni gcig yin no zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir khyed cag gi lugs kyis rig pa ni gcig nyid yin pa la de nyid nges pa yin te /
translated: Since that is a tenet, in your system, cognition is one, and that is ascertained.

original: gang zhig sgrub par byed pa rnams kyis byed par 'gyur ba de la dmigs pa'i gsal ba zhes bya ba gzhan ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gang zhig sgrub par byed pa rnams kyis byed par 'gyur ba de la dmigs pa'i gsal ba zhes bya ba gzhan ci zhig yod /
translated: What other thing called ‚Äúmanifest‚Äù is there that is the object of those who are practicing?

original: 'di snyam du de'i yul can gyi rig pa blo'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di snyam du de'i yul can gyi rig pa blo'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
translated: If you think that the nature of the mind, the cognition that has that as its object, is not so,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: then what is it?

original: yid kyi rang bzhin yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that it is the nature of mind,

original: de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: blo dang dmigs pa dang / nges pa dang / yid dang / yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo dang dmigs pa dang / nges pa dang / yid dang / yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because mind, object, ascertainment, mind, and right cognition are not different things.

original: 'di yang phyis ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yang phyis ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: de'i yul la @157b dmigs pa'i sgrib pa zad pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i yul la @157b dmigs pa'i sgrib pa zad pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsal ba ma yin te /
translated: The characteristic of the exhaustion of the obscurations that have that as their object is also not manifest,

original: rgyu rnam pa gnyis po de nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu rnam pa gnyis po de nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of just those two reasons.

original: 'di ltar de la dmigs pa'i sgrib pa gang yin pa de ni rtag pa'i phyir zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de la dmigs pa'i sgrib pa gang yin pa de ni rtag pa'i phyir zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Because the obscurations that have that as their object are permanent, they do not come to an end.

original: mi mngon pa'i mtshan nyid kyi zad pa yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi mngon pa'i mtshan nyid kyi zad pa yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: The exhaustion of the characteristic of non-manifestation is also unreasonable.

original: sngar gyi ngo bo ma btang bar mi mngon pa srid pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdmigs pa gnyis pa yang med pa'i phyir dmigs pa'i sgrib pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar gyi ngo bo ma btang bar mi mngon pa srid pa'i phyir ro // dmigs pa gnyis pa yang med pa'i phyir dmigs pa'i sgrib pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is possible that the previous entity is not relinquished and is not manifest.üîΩAnd because there is no second object, the obscuration of the object does not exist.

original: med pa la ni sgrib pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: med pa la ni sgrib pa mi rigs te /
translated: For, it is not reasonable that there be an obscuration of the non-existent.

original: de ni dngos po yod pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dngos po yod pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has as its object an existent entity.

original: de lta bas na de zad pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na de zad pa ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, its exhaustion is unreasonable.

original: yang na rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i yul can gyi rigs pa ni rtag pa'i phyir sgrib pa med la /
analyzed: yang na rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i yul can gyi rigs pa ni rtag pa'i phyir sgrib pa med la /
translated: Or, the meaning of the phrase ‚Äúbecause of its permanence‚Äù is this: because the obscuration of the object of that is permanent, there is no obscuration;

original: de med pa'i phyir zad par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin no //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir zad par mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin no //
translated: and because it does not exist, its exhaustion is unreasonable.

original: sgrib pa zad pa yang sus kyang bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrib pa zad pa yang sus kyang bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the exhaustion of obscuration is not something that anyone can accomplish,

original: de ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is essenceless.

original: 'bras bu yod par smra ba'i phyogs la sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba don med par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod par smra ba'i phyogs la sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba don med par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is it pointless to posit an argument for the position that effects exist,

original: bcings pa dang thar pa med par thal ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad chad par thal ba yang mi zlogs te /
analyzed: bcings pa dang thar pa med par thal ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad chad par thal ba yang mi zlogs te /
translated: but the absurd consequence that there would be no bondage and no liberation and the absurd consequence that all mundane conventions would be annihilated cannot be averted.

original: 'di ltar khyed cag gi gtso bo dang skyes bu dag so sor dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid de kho na nyid shes pa skye ba na thar pa ni 'dod la /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyed cag gi gtso bo dang skyes bu dag so sor dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid de kho na nyid shes pa skye ba na thar pa ni 'dod la /
translated: Thus, you assert that liberation is the arising of the knowledge of reality, the defining characteristic of the individual self, the primary nature, and the person.

original: de kho na nyid shes pa de yang thams cad du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: de kho na nyid shes pa de yang thams cad du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir //
translated: And because that knowledge of reality exists for all,

original: lus can thams cad thar pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus can thams cad thar pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: all embodied beings would be liberated.

original: de'i phyir bcings pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bcings pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there would be no bondage.

original: log pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis kyang bcings par 'dod la /
analyzed: log pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis kyang bcings par 'dod la /
translated: You assert that bondage is due to the power of wrong knowledge.

original: de ni thams cad du gnas pa nyid kyis thams cad du thams cad bcings pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni thams cad du gnas pa nyid kyis thams cad du thams cad bcings pa'i phyir /
translated: But because that exists for all, all would be bound by all.

original: gang las thar pa yin /
analyzed: gang las thar pa yin /
translated: From what would they be liberated?

original: 'jig rten yang phan pa dang mi phan pa thob pa dang / spong ba'i don du 'jug la 'bras bu yod par smra ba'i phyogs la yang cung zad thob par bya ba 'am spang bar bya ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten yang phan pa dang mi phan pa thob pa dang / spong ba'i don du 'jug la 'bras bu yod par smra ba'i phyogs la yang cung zad thob par bya ba 'am spang bar bya ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: The world also engages for the sake of obtaining benefit and non-benefit and abandoning harm, but in the position of the proponents of the existence of effects, there is nothing to obtain or abandon in the least.

original: 'gro ba byed pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba byed pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the world would be devoid of activity.

original: de lta bas na tha snyad thams cad chad par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na tha snyad thams cad chad par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it follows that all conventions would be annihilated.

original: de ltar re zhi ga  'bras bu yod par smra ba bsal nas /
analyzed: de ltar re zhi ga  'bras bu yod par smra ba bsal nas /
translated: Having thus refuted the proponents of the existence of effects,

original: 'bras bu med par smra ba'i phyogs la yod pa'i skyon spang pa'i phyir /üîΩyon tan gsum ldan dbyer med kyang //
analyzed: 'bras bu med par smra ba'i phyogs la yod pa'i skyon spang pa'i phyir / yon tan gsum ldan dbyer med kyang //
translated: in order to clear away the faults that exist in the position of the proponents of the nonexistence of effects,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúAlthough inseparable, possessing the three qualities,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'bras bu yod pa bkag pa nyid kyi shugs kyis 'bras bu med pa yin par grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod pa bkag pa nyid kyi shugs kyis 'bras bu med pa yin par grub pa nyid de /
translated: The proponents of the nonexistence of effects are established by the force of the refutation of the existence of effects itself.

original: yod pa dang med pa dag ni /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa dag ni /
translated: Because existence and nonexistence
are mutually exclusive,

original: tshun spongs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshun spongs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: since they are characterized by being incompatible, there is no other alternative.

original: de yang bshad pa don med do zhe na /
analyzed: de yang bshad pa don med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the explanation is pointless,

original: de lta na yang dag gzhan gyis bkod pa'i skyon ltar snang bar bstan pa'i phyir brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang dag gzhan gyis bkod pa'i skyon ltar snang bar bstan pa'i phyir brjod par bya'o //
translated: then we reply that we must state it in order to show that the faults that you have advanced against us are just the opposite of what they should be.

original: de la re zhig de ni bya bar mi nus te //
analyzed: de la re zhig de ni bya bar mi nus te //
translated: To begin with, that is not possible,

original: ngo bo med phyir zhes gang smras pa de ni ma grub ste /
analyzed: ngo bo med phyir zhes gang smras pa de ni ma grub ste /
translated: because what you have said, ‚Äúbecause it has no intrinsic reality,‚Äù is not established.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid bya bar khas blangs pa'i phyir la dngos po'i ngo bo de yang ngo bo med par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid bya bar khas blangs pa'i phyir la dngos po'i ngo bo de yang ngo bo med par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you have accepted that the intrinsic reality of a thing is its activity, and because that intrinsic reality of a thing is not established as having no intrinsic reality.

original: gal te de skyes pa las sngar rang bzhin med pa nyid yin no zhe na ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de skyes pa las sngar rang bzhin med pa nyid yin no zhe na ma yin no //
translated: If you say that it is without intrinsic reality prior to its arising, that is not so.

original: de nyid rang bzhin med pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid rang bzhin med pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not reasonable that it is without intrinsic reality.

original: rang bzhin nyid rang bzhin med par rigs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid rang bzhin med par rigs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable that intrinsic reality itself is without intrinsic reality.

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid gyi mtshan nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin bkag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid gyi mtshan nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin bkag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the characteristic of being without intrinsic reality is the negation of the intrinsic reality of a thing.

original: gang gis de nyid rang bzhin med par 'grub par 'gyur ba skye ba las sngar bya ba'i dngos po de yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis de nyid rang bzhin med par 'grub par 'gyur ba skye ba las sngar bya ba'i dngos po de yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But the entity that would be produced prior to arising does not exist.

original: ci ste dngos po dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo med pa'i chos can phyogs su byas nas ngo bo med phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs su byed pa de'i tshe grub pa la sgrub ste /
analyzed: ci ste dngos po dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo med pa'i chos can phyogs su byas nas ngo bo med phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs su byed pa de'i tshe grub pa la sgrub ste /
translated: But if you take as the subject a phenomenon that lacks the nature of being an entity, and you use ‚Äúbecause of lacking entityness‚Äù as the reason, then the argument proves what is already established for you.

original: dngos po dang bral ba ni sus kyang byed par khas ma blangs so //
analyzed: dngos po dang bral ba ni sus kyang byed par khas ma blangs so //
translated: Because no one accepts that something that lacks an entity is produced.

original: gzhan yang gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, the reason is indefinite.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnod par byed pa'i mtshan ma ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnod par byed pa'i mtshan ma ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you have not stated a sign that rules out the contrary.

original: 'di ltar rgyu'i nus pa so sor nges pa'i phyir gang la skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yod pa'i med pa 'ga' zhig ni byed la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu'i nus pa so sor nges pa'i phyir gang la skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yod pa'i med pa 'ga' zhig ni byed la /
translated: Because the power of causes is restricted, a cause that produces something produces only that which exists, not that which does not exist.

original: nam mkha'i pad ma la sogs pa gang la rgyu med pa de ni mi byed pa'i phyir ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i pad ma la sogs pa gang la rgyu med pa de ni mi byed pa'i phyir ma nges pa yin no //
translated: But because a cause does not produce something that does not exist, such as the sky flower, the reason is indefinite.

original: thams cad thams cad kyi rgyur mi 'dod cing gang dang gang med pa de dang de byed pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i khyab pa yang mi 'dod do //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad kyi rgyur mi 'dod cing gang dang gang med pa de dang de byed pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i khyab pa yang mi 'dod do //
translated: But we do not accept that everything is the cause of everything, nor do we accept the pervasion that whatever does not exist is a cause.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What do we accept?

original: gang byed pa de ni skye ba las sngar med pa nyid do zhes 'dod do //üîΩ'di snyam du rgyu rnams med pa byed par mtshungs pa la /
analyzed: gang byed pa de ni skye ba las sngar med pa nyid do zhes 'dod do // 'di snyam du rgyu rnams med pa byed par mtshungs pa la /
translated: We accept that whatever is a cause does not exist prior to its effect.

original: ci'i phyir rgyu thams cad med pa thams cad kyi rgyur mi 'gyur snyam du sems na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rgyu thams cad med pa thams cad kyi rgyur mi 'gyur snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúWhy don‚Äôt all nonexistent causes become the causes of everything?‚Äù

original: rtsod pa 'di ni khyed cag la yang yod par mtshungs pa la ci'i phyir rgyu thams cad yod par thams cad kyi rgyur mi 'gyur zhes mtshungs so //
analyzed: rtsod pa 'di ni khyed cag la yang yod par mtshungs pa la ci'i phyir rgyu thams cad yod par thams cad kyi rgyur mi 'gyur zhes mtshungs so //
translated: This objection is equally applicable to you: Why don‚Äôt all existent causes become the causes of everything?

original: gang gis de mi byed pa khyed cag gi lugs kyis med pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis de mi byed pa khyed cag gi lugs kyis med pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In your system, nothing whatsoever exists that does not cause something.

original: rgyu'i nus pa nges pa'i phyir yod pa yin na yang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa mi byed do zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa nges pa'i phyir yod pa yin na yang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa mi byed do zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúEven though they exist, because the power of causes is restricted, they do not produce rabbit horns,‚Äù

original: de ni cig shos la yang @158b mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni cig shos la yang @158b mtshungs so //
translated: The same applies to the other.

original: gang gi yang dper na khyed cag gi yon tan gsum dang ldan pa thams cad du khyad par med na yang nus pa nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi yang dper na khyed cag gi yon tan gsum dang ldan pa thams cad du khyad par med na yang nus pa nges pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, although all three qualities are not distinguished in any way, still, because their power is restricted,

original: thams cad thams cad byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad byed pa ma yin no //
translated: all do not produce everything.

original: thams cad kyi 'am 'di la 'bras bu thams cad kyi byed pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyi 'am 'di la 'bras bu thams cad kyi byed pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúall produce all‚Äù should be analyzed as ‚Äúall produce the effect of all.‚Äù

original: de bzhin 'bras bu med pa 'am ngo bo 'ga' zhig rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin yang thams cad thams cad byed par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin 'bras bu med pa 'am ngo bo 'ga' zhig rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin yang thams cad thams cad byed par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, although some do not have an effect or some essence that is concomitant, still, all do not produce everything.

original: gang yin de 'dra med na yang //
analyzed: gang yin de 'dra med na yang //
translated: Even though there is no such thing,

original: zhes bya ba 'di yang khas blangs nas brjod pa yin gyi mtshungs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di yang khas blangs nas brjod pa yin gyi mtshungs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: This is also stated by accepting the opponent‚Äôs position. It is not similar to the example.

original: 'di ltar bye brag yod na yang 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig nyid kyi rgyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bye brag yod na yang 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig nyid kyi rgyur 'gyur te /
translated: Even though there is a difference, some things become the cause of some things.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par nges pa ni rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las yang dag par 'ongs pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par nges pa ni rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las yang dag par 'ongs pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: Since the determination of the nature of such a thing comes from its own causal continuum, there is no contradiction.

original: tha mi dad pa ni gcig la dus gcig tu rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa phan tshun 'gal ba ji ltar srid pa yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa ni gcig la dus gcig tu rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa phan tshun 'gal ba ji ltar srid pa yin te /
translated: How can non-difference, i.e., one thing at one time, be both cause and non-cause, mutually contradictory?

original: dngos po tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ni /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan ni /
translated: The reason for the difference of entities is

original: 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they possess contradictory properties.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And it is said:

original: tha dad na yang 'ga' zhig ni //
analyzed: tha dad na yang 'ga' zhig ni //
translated: Even if different, one

original: dngos chos nyid kyi byed por 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos chos nyid kyi byed por 'gyur //
translated: would be the maker of the real thing.

original: tha dad med na gcig de yis //üîΩbya ba byed pa 'gal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: tha dad med na gcig de yis // bya ba byed pa 'gal bar 'gyur //
translated: If not different, the one

original: zhes bshad do //üîΩnges pa grub pa ma rdzogs phyir //
analyzed: zhes bshad do // nges pa grub pa ma rdzogs phyir //
translated: would be contradictory in performing the action.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan dag nus pa nges pa med pa bstan pa'i don du rtsod par byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan dag nus pa nges pa med pa bstan pa'i don du rtsod par byed do //
translated: Others argue that the statement ‚Äúbecause the determination of the effect is not complete‚Äù and so on teaches that other things lack definite power.

original: khyod kyi zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu med par smra ba sangs rgyas pa khyod kyi rgyu dag ni nus pa nges pa mi 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu med par smra ba sangs rgyas pa khyod kyi rgyu dag ni nus pa nges pa mi 'thad pa'o //
translated: Your cause, O Buddhist, who advocates the non-existence of effect, is not tenable as having a definite potency.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: nges pa rnams te 'bras bur gyur pa rnams ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa rnams te 'bras bur gyur pa rnams ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the effects, which are definite, are not established.

original: 'bras bu med par 'bras bu rgyu dang ldan pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu med par 'bras bu rgyu dang ldan pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That which is without effect does not have a cause.

original: sbyor ba ni gang dag yod par gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i nges pas stong pa de dag ni nus pa nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang dag yod par gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i nges pas stong pa de dag ni nus pa nges pa ma yin te /
translated: The application is this: those which are empty of the definiteness of an existent effect do not have a definite potency,

original: dper na ri bong gi rva la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ri bong gi rva la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like the horns of a rabbit, and so on.üîΩThe thing, such as a rice seed, is empty of the definiteness of an existent effect.

original: s'a lu'i sa bon la sogs pa'i dngos po yang yod par gyur pa'i 'bras bu nges pas stong pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon la sogs pa'i dngos po yang yod par gyur pa'i 'bras bu nges pas stong pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the non-apprehension of the pervasion.

original: rang gi phyogs legs par gnas par bstan pa'i phyir //üîΩyod na de yi nges pa ni //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs legs par gnas par bstan pa'i phyir // yod na de yi nges pa ni //
translated: In order to demonstrate the soundness of his own position,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIf it exists, its definiteness,‚Äù and so on.

original: yod na ste /
analyzed: yod na ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it exists‚Äù means

original: 'bras bu rnams yod pa yin na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu rnams yod pa yin na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: if the effects exist.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni nus pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni nus pa'i 'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the potentiality.

original: de lta min zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid du @159a * //
analyzed: de lta min zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid du @159a * //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise,‚Äù etc. shows that the reason is uncertain.

original: brjod do // 'di ltar nges pa de dag ma grub pa na gal te zho skyed pa la 'o ma nus so zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di med du zad mod /
analyzed: brjod do // 'di ltar nges pa de dag ma grub pa na gal te zho skyed pa la 'o ma nus so zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di med du zad mod /
translated: If the certainty of that is not established, then it is simply the case that the convention ‚Äúmilk has the potentiality to produce curd‚Äù does not exist.

original: gang yang rnam pa de lta bu'i khyad par thams cad kyis stong pa sgro ma btags pa'i dngos po sngar ma mthong ba gang gi de ma thag tu dngos po gzhan skye ba de la 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: gang yang rnam pa de lta bu'i khyad par thams cad kyis stong pa sgro ma btags pa'i dngos po sngar ma mthong ba gang gi de ma thag tu dngos po gzhan skye ba de la 'gag pa med do //
translated: But if something is empty of all such features, and is not a reified entity, and was not seen before, then the other entity that arises immediately after it does not cease.üîΩIf you think that the intrinsic reality of that is also eliminated,

original: 'di snyam du gang la sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag mi 'jug pa de la dngos po'i rang bzhin yang ldog pa nyid yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gang la sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag mi 'jug pa de la dngos po'i rang bzhin yang ldog pa nyid yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: since neither words nor thoughts apply to it,üîΩthen NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: ming ni dngos po'i ngo bo min //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ming ni dngos po'i ngo bo min //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: A name is not the entity itself.

original: khyad par byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid log na rang gi khyad par bya ba ldog par byed la /
analyzed: khyad par byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid log na rang gi khyad par bya ba ldog par byed la /
translated: In particular, when the nature of the agent is stopped, the action that is to be performed by it is stopped.

original: rgyu log pa na yang 'bras bu ldog ste /
analyzed: rgyu log pa na yang 'bras bu ldog ste /
translated: And when the cause is stopped, the effect is stopped,

original: 'brel ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the connection between them.

original: gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not otherwise,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the absurdity of the consequence.

original: gang gis de log pa na rnam pa de lta bu'i dngos po ldog par 'gyur ba 'o ma la ni zho'i nus pa yod do zhes bya ba ni de lta bu la sogs pa'i ming ste /
analyzed: gang gis de log pa na rnam pa de lta bu'i dngos po ldog par 'gyur ba 'o ma la ni zho'i nus pa yod do zhes bya ba ni de lta bu la sogs pa'i ming ste /
translated: When that is stopped, the entity of that kind is stopped. The statement ‚ÄúThe milk has the potency of curd‚Äù is an example of that kind.

original: tha snyad dngos po rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo'i rang bzhin ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad dngos po rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo'i rang bzhin ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature of entities is not the nature of their own entity.

original: gang gis de ldog pa na de lta bu'i rnam pa'i dngos po ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis de ldog pa na de lta bu'i rnam pa'i dngos po ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: When that is stopped, the entity of that kind is stopped.

original: ming smos pa ni mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: ming smos pa ni mtshon pa ste /
translated: The mention of the name is an illustration.

original: rnam par rtog pa yang de dang bsres la bzung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yang de dang bsres la bzung ngo //
translated: Imagination is also to be understood as mixed with that.

original: ngo bo smos pa yang mtshon pa ste ming dngos po rnams kyi rgyu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ngo bo smos pa yang mtshon pa ste ming dngos po rnams kyi rgyu yang ma yin te /
translated: The mention of the entity is also an illustration. The name is not the cause of entities.

original: de med na yang dngos po yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na yang dngos po yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because even when that does not exist, entities exist.

original: 'dir rgyu ni /
analyzed: 'dir rgyu ni /
translated: Here, the reason is stated:

original: 'di ltar rnam rtog brjod pa ni //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam rtog brjod pa ni // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Thus, conceptualization and expressionüîΩare based on the combination of name and referent.

original: 'di ltar ni gang gi phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ni gang gi phyir te /
translated: Thus means because.

original: rnam rtog ni ming dang 'dres pa la brten pa'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog ni ming dang 'dres pa la brten pa'o //
translated: Conceptualization is based on the combination of name and referent.

original: brjod pa yang sgra'o //
analyzed: brjod pa yang sgra'o //
translated: Expression is sound.

original: rtog pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma ni dbyer med cing cha shas med pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gcig la /
analyzed: rtog pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma ni dbyer med cing cha shas med pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gcig la /
translated: Various conceptualizations of many kinds occur in regard to the nature of a single, partless entity.

original: ji ltar goms pa bzhin du 'jug go //
analyzed: ji ltar goms pa bzhin du 'jug go //
translated: They occur in accordance with the way they are familiar.

original: 'di ltar sgra la sogs pa'i dngos po gcig kho na la rtag pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos gzhung lugs tha dad pa la gnas pa'i rgol ba rnams kyis rtog par byed cing rjod par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra la sogs pa'i dngos po gcig kho na la rtag pa la sogs pa'i ngo bos gzhung lugs tha dad pa la gnas pa'i rgol ba rnams kyis rtog par byed cing rjod par byed do //
translated: Thus, in regard to a single entity such as sound, disputants who adhere to different philosophical systems conceptualize and express it in terms of its nature as permanent and so on.

original: sgra dang rnam par rtog pa de dag dngos po de'i bdag nyid dam de'i yul can yin na dngos po sna tshogs par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: sgra dang rnam par rtog pa de dag dngos po de'i bdag nyid dam de'i yul can yin na dngos po sna tshogs par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: If those sounds and conceptualizations are the nature of that entity or they have that as their object, then the entity would become various.

original: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du sgra dang rnam par rtog pa rnams /üîΩgcig gi ngo bo nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du sgra dang rnam par rtog pa rnams / gcig gi ngo bo nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Sound and conceptualization would be the same nature as the nature of the entity.

original: gcig nyid sna tshogs pa yin no zhes ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig nyid sna tshogs pa yin no zhes ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not logical to say that one thing is various.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow, absurdly, that anything would be possible.

original: de lta bas na nus pa nges pa'i phyir med pa @159b 'ga' zhig byed kyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na nus pa nges pa'i phyir med pa @159b 'ga' zhig byed kyi /
translated: Therefore, because the potency is ascertained, it is not the case that anything nonexistent is produced.

original: thams cad ni ma yin pas ngo bo med phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa yang yin no //
analyzed: thams cad ni ma yin pas ngo bo med phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma nges pa yang yin no //
translated: Since it is not the case that everything is produced, the reason ‚Äúbecause they do not exist by virtue of their own nature‚Äù is not established.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgyu len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs bzhi po yang ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rgyu len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs bzhi po yang ma nges pa yin te /
translated: For that reason, the four reasons such as ‚Äúbecause they are the cause of grasping‚Äù are also not established.

original: 'di ltar gal te 'bras bu yod pa byas pa nyid nges pa'i rgyu len pa 'ga' zhig tu grub par gyur na de'i tshe de lta yin par gyur na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te 'bras bu yod pa byas pa nyid nges pa'i rgyu len pa 'ga' zhig tu grub par gyur na de'i tshe de lta yin par gyur na /
translated: If the effect that is produced were established as the cause of grasping that ascertains existence, then it would be like that.

original: ji srid du rgyu'i nus pa nges pas byas pa yang nges pa'i rgyu len par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji srid du rgyu'i nus pa nges pas byas pa yang nges pa'i rgyu len par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: But as long as the potency of the cause is ascertained, it is not logical that the produced is ascertained as the cause of grasping.

original: rgyu'i nus pa nges pa kho na'i phyir yang thams cad thams cad las skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa nges pa kho na'i phyir yang thams cad thams cad las skye ba ma yin te /
translated: Also, not everything arises from everything, because the potency of the cause is restricted.

original: thams cad don gyi bya ba thams cad byed pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgang yang / khyad par byar med gang yin pa //
analyzed: thams cad don gyi bya ba thams cad byed pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro // gang yang / khyad par byar med gang yin pa //
translated: Because everything does not have the nature of performing the function of everything.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de yang bsam pa ma shes nas smras pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de yang bsam pa ma shes nas smras pa yin te /
translated: Also, the statement, ‚ÄúThat which cannot be made different,‚Äù and so on, is spoken without understanding the intention.

original: gang gis 'gyur ba yin na de'i rang bzhin nyams par thal bar 'gyur ba kho bo cag gis ni med pa byed do zhes ma brjod do //
analyzed: gang gis 'gyur ba yin na de'i rang bzhin nyams par thal bar 'gyur ba kho bo cag gis ni med pa byed do zhes ma brjod do //
translated: If it were so, then it would follow that its nature would be lost, and we do not say that nonexistence is made.

original: 'on kyang dngos po nyid byed do zhes sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po nyid byed do zhes sngar bstan zin to //
translated: However, it has been previously explained that things themselves are made.

original: dngos po de yang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gyur pa las ma dmigs pa'i phyir dang grub pa yang 'bras bu nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po de yang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gyur pa las ma dmigs pa'i phyir dang grub pa yang 'bras bu nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
translated: Also, that thing is not prior to arising, because it is not observed by the characteristic of observation and because it is not tenable that what is established is an effect.

original: skye ba las sngar med pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba las sngar med pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is nonexistent prior to arising.

original: rgyu gang zhig nye ba tsam gyis de de lta bur gyur pa skyed pa na des de byed de zhes tha snyad du byas kyi /
analyzed: rgyu gang zhig nye ba tsam gyis de de lta bur gyur pa skyed pa na des de byed de zhes tha snyad du byas kyi /
translated: When a cause merely approaches, it produces that which is like it, and it is conventionally said that it produces that.

original: bya ba dang 'brel pas 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bya ba dang 'brel pas 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it does not produce anything through a relationship with an action,

original: chos thams cad ni bya ba med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni bya ba med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all things are devoid of action.

original: med pa zhes bya ba gang zhig cung zad yod pa 'am /
analyzed: med pa zhes bya ba gang zhig cung zad yod pa 'am /
translated: What is called ‚Äúnonexistent‚Äù does not exist as anything whatsoever.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Nor does it transform into anything else,

original: med pa'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin bkag pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin bkag pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the characteristic of nonexistence is the mere negation of the nature of an existent thing.

original: gzhan yang gal te khyad par du byar med pa'i phyir med pa mi byed do zhes brjod la /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te khyad par du byar med pa'i phyir med pa mi byed do zhes brjod la /
translated: Moreover, if you say that an existent does not produce an existent because it has nothing to add,

original: yod pa yang rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i khyad par du byar med pa'i phyir de ji ltar byed /
analyzed: yod pa yang rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i khyad par du byar med pa'i phyir de ji ltar byed /
translated: then how could an existent produce a nonexistent, since it has nothing to add to that either?

original: de lta bas na nus pas ni nus pa byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni ma nges la /
analyzed: de lta bas na nus pas ni nus pa byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni ma nges la /
translated: Therefore, it is not certain that ‚Äúan existent produces an existent because it has the ability to do so.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu med par smra ba la yang rgyu'i dngos po rigs pa yin pa'i phyi rgyu yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di yang ma nges pa yin no //üîΩyang na sngar yod pa 'bras bu nyid du mi srid par bstan pa'i phyir dang / 'bras bu med par smra ba kho na'i rgyu len pa la sogs pa'i nges pa rigs pa yin pa'i phyir /üîΩrgyu len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs bzhi po 'gal ba @160a * //
analyzed: 'bras bu med par smra ba la yang rgyu'i dngos po rigs pa yin pa'i phyi rgyu yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di yang ma nges pa yin no // yang na sngar yod pa 'bras bu nyid du mi srid par bstan pa'i phyir dang / 'bras bu med par smra ba kho na'i rgyu len pa la sogs pa'i nges pa rigs pa yin pa'i phyir / rgyu len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs bzhi po 'gal ba @160a * //
translated: Also, the reason ‚Äúbecause the effect exists‚Äù is indefinite for the proponent of the nonexistence of the effect, because it is reasonable that the entity of the cause exists.

original: yin te / bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin te / bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, the four reasons ‚Äúbecause the cause is appropriated‚Äù and so on are contradictory, because they prove the opposite of the probandum, since they teach that it is impossible for something that previously exists to be an effect and because it is reasonable that the ascertainment of appropriation of a cause and so on is only for the proponent of the nonexistence of the effect.

original: gal te khyed cag gi lugs kyis med pa nyid skye'o zhes bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te khyed cag gi lugs kyis med pa nyid skye'o zhes bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: If you say that in your system nonexistence itself arises,

original: de'i phyir ji ltar mdo las yod pa dang med pa'i skye ba bkag ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar mdo las yod pa dang med pa'i skye ba bkag ste /
translated: then how could the s≈´tra refute the arising of both existence and nonexistence?

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it says:

original: blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste /
analyzed: blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste /
translated: MahƒÅmati, all phenomena are unarisen.

original: yod pa dang med pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so zhe na /
translated: Because existence and nonexistence are not produced.

original: 'di la skye ba dngos po'i ngo bo 'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'di la skye ba dngos po'i ngo bo 'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To this it is replied: ‚ÄúProduction is the intrinsic reality of things, etc.‚Äù

original: 'ang gi sgra ni nges par bzung ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'ang gi sgra ni nges par bzung ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the sense of exclusion.

original: khyad par gzhan spangs pas de tsam zhig shes par 'dod pa na /
analyzed: khyad par gzhan spangs pas de tsam zhig shes par 'dod pa na /
translated: When one wishes to know just that much, having excluded other distinctions,

original: dngos po rnams kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa skad cig ma tsam gyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin nyid la skye ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa skad cig ma tsam gyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin nyid la skye ba zhes brjod do //
translated: the emptiness of the prior and subsequent limits of things is called ‚Äúproduction,‚Äù because it is the intrinsic reality of the momentary state.

original: bye brag tu smra bas kun du brtags pa'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra bas kun du brtags pa'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi skye ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the production that is the characteristic of an imagined conditioned thing, as the VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas say,

original: de ni dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩbye brag pas yongs su brtags pa'i yod pa'i 'du ba skye ba 'am /
analyzed: de ni dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // bye brag pas yongs su brtags pa'i yod pa'i 'du ba skye ba 'am /
translated: because that is to be refuted.üîΩIt is not the production of the combination of an imagined existent, as the Vai≈õe·π£ikas say,

original: rang gi rgyu 'du ba yang ma yin te de dag kyang 'gegs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu 'du ba yang ma yin te de dag kyang 'gegs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: or the combination of its own causes, because those are also to be refuted.

original: gzhan gyi lugs kyis kyang de dag rtag pa'i phyir dang / brtag pa yang skye ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lugs kyis kyang de dag rtag pa'i phyir dang / brtag pa yang skye ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the permanence of those, and because it is not tenable that an existent arises.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: yod pa rang rgyu dang 'brel pa //
analyzed: yod pa rang rgyu dang 'brel pa //
translated: An existent is related to its cause

original: byed pas rgyu ni yin par grags //
analyzed: byed pas rgyu ni yin par grags //
translated: Because of the activity of the cause.

original: yod pa de dang 'brel pa de //üîΩbrtag pa 'di la 'bras bu gang //
analyzed: yod pa de dang 'brel pa de // brtag pa 'di la 'bras bu gang //
translated: That existent is related to that

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: What is the effect in this imputation?

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi skye ba de ni med pa dang de'i bdag nyid kyi 'brel pa ni med de /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi skye ba de ni med pa dang de'i bdag nyid kyi 'brel pa ni med de /
translated: That kind of arising does not exist, and there is no relation of identity with it.

original: yod pa dang med pa dag ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa dag ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because an existent and a nonexistent are contradictory.

original: gang gi phyir med pa ni med par yang 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir med pa ni med par yang 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Because a nonexistent does not become nonexistent.

original: yod pa dang med pa sngar byung ba dang 'brel pa med de //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa sngar byung ba dang 'brel pa med de //
translated: An existent does not occur in relation to a nonexistent.

original: de ni sngar med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni sngar med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist previously.

original: de ni 'bras bu med par smra ba khyed cag la ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu med par smra ba khyed cag la ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it for you Proponents of Effects That Do Not Preexist in the Cause?

original: brtags pa'i blos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: brtags pa'i blos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe mind that imputes,‚Äù and so on.

original: brtags pa'i blo byed pa bor gyur pa 'am byed par gyur pas med pa'i byed pa po dang sbrel ba 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
analyzed: brtags pa'i blo byed pa bor gyur pa 'am byed par gyur pas med pa'i byed pa po dang sbrel ba 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
translated: The mind that imagines is either the agent that has ceased or the agent that has not ceased. It is only connected with the non-existent agent.

original: 'brel pa thob par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'brel pa thob par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is connected with the non-existent agent.

original: gang skye bar 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: gang skye bar 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba ni cung zad kyang med de /
translated: There is not even the slightest thing that is called ‚Äúnon-arisen.‚Äù

original: 'on kyang gang med pa skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni btags pa'i tha snyad yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang med pa skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni btags pa'i tha snyad yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: However, this is the conventional designation of what is called ‚Äúthe non-arisen arising.‚Äù This is the meaning.

original: yang gang gis 'di lta bu'i tha snyad 'di 'dod pas brtags pa'i sa bon gang zhig yin zhe na /üîΩgcig gi rjes la dngos po yi //
analyzed: yang gang gis 'di lta bu'i tha snyad 'di 'dod pas brtags pa'i sa bon gang zhig yin zhe na / gcig gi rjes la dngos po yi //
translated: Moreover, what is the seed that is imagined by those who assert such a convention?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe thing that is subsequent to one,‚Äù and so on.

original: @160b gcig gi ste so sor nges pa'i dngos po gang yin pa 'ga' zhig gi de ma thag tu sngar ma mthong ba'i dngos po dmigs te /
analyzed: @160b gcig gi ste so sor nges pa'i dngos po gang yin pa 'ga' zhig gi de ma thag tu sngar ma mthong ba'i dngos po dmigs te /
translated: The thing that is subsequent to one is a thing that is individually distinct. Something that was not seen before is observed immediately after it.

original: de bar gyi gnas skabs las sngar yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bar gyi gnas skabs las sngar yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It does not exist prior to that, in the interim.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa las ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa las ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the non-apprehension of that which has the characteristic of an object is not apprehended.

original: de lta bas na 'di ni sngar med pa skye'o zhes bya ba brtags pa 'dis sa bon yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di ni sngar med pa skye'o zhes bya ba brtags pa 'dis sa bon yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the seed of the notion that what did not previously exist is produced.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: snga na yod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: snga na yod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says: because of the non-existence of what existed previously, etc.

original: bar gyi gnas skabs las sngar bar gyi gnas skabs bzhin du yod na ste /
analyzed: bar gyi gnas skabs las sngar bar gyi gnas skabs bzhin du yod na ste /
translated: If it existed previously, i.e., prior to the intermediate state, like the intermediate state itself,

original: bdog pa dngos po'i ngo bo yod pa yin na med pa skye'o zhes bya ba'i brtags pa'i rgyu mtshan 'di yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdog pa dngos po'i ngo bo yod pa yin na med pa skye'o zhes bya ba'i brtags pa'i rgyu mtshan 'di yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then this reason for the notion that what did not previously exist is produced would not exist, i.e., the existence of the entity that is the object.

original: 'di ltar skye ba zhes bya ba 'dis bar ma'i gnas skabs su 'byung ba nges pa'i ngo bo kho na brjod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba zhes bya ba 'dis bar ma'i gnas skabs su 'byung ba nges pa'i ngo bo kho na brjod do //
translated: Thus, this so-called production is said to be the very nature of the occurrence in the intermediate state.

original: gal te de sngar yang yod pa yin na de'i tshe de bar gyi gnas skabs 'byung ba'i phyir bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo nges pa gang yin pa de nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te de sngar yang yod pa yin na de'i tshe de bar gyi gnas skabs 'byung ba'i phyir bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo nges pa gang yin pa de nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: If it existed previously, then at that time, because of the occurrence of the intermediate state, the nature of the action would be undermined, i.e., its definite nature would be undermined.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du gnas pa la sngar dang phyis dang bar gyi gnas skabs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du gnas pa la sngar dang phyis dang bar gyi gnas skabs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is like space, it is not tenable that it is everywhere, since it has no prior or subsequent states.

original: de'i phyir thams cad du thams cad skye ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tha snyad du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad du thams cad skye ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tha snyad du 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the expression ‚Äúarising everywhere‚Äù would be meaningless,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no distinction.

original: gzhan yang 'bras bu yod par smra ba rnam pa gzhan gyis sun dbyung ba'i phyir /üîΩ'o ma sogs la zho la sogs //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'bras bu yod par smra ba rnam pa gzhan gyis sun dbyung ba'i phyir / 'o ma sogs la zho la sogs //
translated: Moreover, the assertion that effects exist is refuted in another way:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Curds and so on are not in milk and so on.

original: khyed cag gis rgyu la 'bras bu yod do zhes gang brjod pa de ni don ci la bsams /üîΩci gsal ba'i ngo bos sam /
analyzed: khyed cag gis rgyu la 'bras bu yod do zhes gang brjod pa de ni don ci la bsams / ci gsal ba'i ngo bos sam /
translated: What is the meaning of your statement, ‚ÄúThe effect exists in the cause‚Äù?

original: 'on te nus pa'i ngo bos yin grang /
analyzed: 'on te nus pa'i ngo bos yin grang /
translated: Is it the meaning of manifest state or the meaning of potential?

original: gal te gsal ba'i ngo bos yin na de'i tshe 'o ma la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang zho la sogs pa phyis bzhin du dmigs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te gsal ba'i ngo bos yin na de'i tshe 'o ma la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang zho la sogs pa phyis bzhin du dmigs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the meaning of manifest state, then it follows that curds and so on would be observed in the state of milk and so on, just as they are later.

original: ci ste nus pa'i ngo bos yin na /
analyzed: ci ste nus pa'i ngo bos yin na /
translated: But if it is the meaning of potential,

original: de la yang nus pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ci dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo zho la sogs pa'i 'bras bu las gzhan yin nam /
analyzed: de la yang nus pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ci dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo zho la sogs pa'i 'bras bu las gzhan yin nam /
translated: Moreover, whatever is the nature of the potential, is that nature, which is characterized by the object, different from the effect, such as yogurt,

original: 'on te de nyid yin gal te de nyid yin na de'i tshe snga ma bzhin du dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te de nyid yin gal te de nyid yin na de'i tshe snga ma bzhin du dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: or is it just that? If it is just that, then it follows that it is perceived as before.

original: 'on te gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs yin na de'i tshe 'bras bu rgyu'i bdag nyid du yod pa yin no zhes bya'i phyogs btang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i phyogs yin na de'i tshe 'bras bu rgyu'i bdag nyid du yod pa yin no zhes bya'i phyogs btang bar 'gyur te /
translated: But if the position is that it is different, then at that time the position that the effect exists in the nature of the cause is abandoned,

original: 'bras bu las tha dad pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po gzhan yod par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu las tha dad pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po gzhan yod par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is accepted that there is a different thing called the potential that is separate from the effect.

original: 'di ltar ro dang nus pa dang smin par byed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par gsal po gang yin pa de nyid zho la sogs pa'i 'bras @161a * //üîΩbu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar ro dang nus pa dang smin par byed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par gsal po gang yin pa de nyid zho la sogs pa'i 'bras @161a * //üîΩbu zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, that which is clearly the specific nature that possesses the qualities of the potential, the ripening, and so on is called the effect, such as yogurt.

original: de yang 'o ma la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su dmigs su rung ba las ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'o ma la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su dmigs su rung ba las ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin no //
translated: It is the object of the expression ‚Äúnonexistent‚Äù because it is not perceived as something that can be perceived, such as milk, etc.

original: gzhan nus pa'i ngo bor yod pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nus pa'i ngo bor yod pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which exists in the nature of a potentiality is not an effect.

original: gzhan yod pa na gzhan yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yod pa na gzhan yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the case that one thing exists when another exists,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on te mar ni tshe yin no //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // 'on te mar ni tshe yin no //
translated: because that would lead to an absurd conclusion.

original: lteng ka'i chu ni rkang nad do zhes gzhan yod pa na gzhan du brjod par mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: lteng ka'i chu ni rkang nad do zhes gzhan yod pa na gzhan du brjod par mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it seen that when one thing exists, another is said to exist, as in the case of ‚Äúthe life of the ghee‚Äù and ‚Äúthe gout of the pond‚Äù?

original: ji ltar dngos su zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos su zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn reality,‚Äù

original: dngos su ste /üîΩnye bar ma btags par zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩrgyu la 'bras bu btags nas mar la tshe zhes brjod kyi dngos su ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos su ste / nye bar ma btags par zhes bya ba'i don to // rgyu la 'bras bu btags nas mar la tshe zhes brjod kyi dngos su ni ma yin no //
translated: in reality,üîΩin actuality.üîΩThe effect is figuratively designated in the cause, as in the case of ‚Äúthe life of the ghee,‚Äù but not in reality.

original: gal te khyed cag kyang btags nas 'bras bus rgyu la yod do zhes brjod na de'i tshe ni 'gal ba cung zad kyang med kyi /
analyzed: gal te khyed cag kyang btags nas 'bras bus rgyu la yod do zhes brjod na de'i tshe ni 'gal ba cung zad kyang med kyi /
translated: If you also say that the effect exists in the cause figuratively, then there is no contradiction at all.

original: dngos su yin na ni 'gal bar brjod do //
analyzed: dngos su yin na ni 'gal bar brjod do //
translated: If it were real, we would say it is contradictory.

original: 'di nyid dpe'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir snying stobs yod pas sdug bsngal dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: 'di nyid dpe'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir snying stobs yod pas sdug bsngal dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to demonstrate this very point through an example, he says, ‚ÄúIf you posit that the essence of sattva is suffering and delusion,‚Äù and so on.

original: khyed kyis snying stobs kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyid sdug bsngal dang rmongs pa dag tu ma bzhag ste /
analyzed: khyed kyis snying stobs kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyid sdug bsngal dang rmongs pa dag tu ma bzhag ste /
translated: You posit that the essence of sattva is suffering and delusion, but you do not posit that the essence of sattva is suffering and delusion.

original: de dag ni phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they remain with mutually different characteristics.

original: da ni khyad par rnams rjes su 'gro bar mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ma grub pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩgsal ba'i snying stobs sogs ldan par //
analyzed: da ni khyad par rnams rjes su 'gro bar mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ma grub pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir / gsal ba'i snying stobs sogs ldan par //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that the reason ‚Äúbecause the particulars are seen to be pervasive‚Äù is not established, he says,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe manifestation of sattva and so on,‚Äù and so forth.

original: sgra la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gsal ba bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor nged la ste kho bo cag la ma grub ste /
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gsal ba bde ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor nged la ste kho bo cag la ma grub ste /
translated: The manifestation of sound and so on, which has the characteristics of sattva and so on, is not established for us as the essence of pleasure and so on.

original: gang gi phyir bde ba la sogs pa ni nang gi yin pas rig pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bde ba la sogs pa ni nang gi yin pas rig pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because pleasure and so on are internal, they are by nature cognition.

original: sgra la sogs pa yang sems pa med pa nyid yin pas de'i phyir 'di dag ji ltar bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa yang sems pa med pa nyid yin pas de'i phyir 'di dag ji ltar bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Sound and so on are also without mind. Therefore, how could they possess pleasure and so on?

original: sbyor ba ni gang dag rig pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa de dag ni bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang dag rig pa'i ngo bo ma yin pa de dag ni bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever is not by nature cognition is not by nature pleasure and so on,

original: dper na gzhan gyis khas blangs pa'i sems pa med pa'i skyes bu bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzhan gyis khas blangs pa'i sems pa med pa'i skyes bu bzhin no //
translated: like, for example, a person without mind as accepted by others.

original: sgra la sogs pa yang rig pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa yang rig pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Sound and so on are devoid of the nature of cognition. This is a nonobservation of a pervader.

original: 'di snyam du gal te bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa la rig pa'i ngo bos nyid kyis khyab pa grub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa la rig pa'i ngo bos nyid kyis khyab pa grub par 'gyur na /
translated: If it were established that being by nature pleasure and so on is pervaded by being by nature cognition,

original: de'i tshe de log na sgra la sogs pa la bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de log na sgra la sogs pa la bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: then when that is refuted, the fact that sound and so on are by nature pleasure and so on would be refuted.

original: gang gi phyir de nyid ma grub ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid ma grub ste /
translated: If you think that it is not established becauseüîΩyou assert that the nature of a person is a rational entity,

original: @161b skyes bu nyid rigs pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: @161b skyes bu nyid rigs pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems na /
translated: then it is said:

original: de yi rang rig gsal phyir ro //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de yi rang rig gsal phyir ro // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because it is the clarity of reflexive awareness.

original: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rigs pa'i ngo bo nyid du grub ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rigs pa'i ngo bo nyid du grub ste /
translated: Therefore, pleasure and so on are established as the nature of a rational entity.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rang rig pa yin la rang rig pa yang gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rang rig pa yin la rang rig pa yang gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because pleasure and so on are reflexive awareness and reflexive awareness is clarity.

original: bde ba la sogs pa rnams dga' ba dang gdung ba la sogs pa'i ngo bos sgra la sogs pa'i yul nye bar yod dam med kyang rung gsal ba gzhan la mi ltos par rang gsal ba'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid rang rig pa 'di'i khyad par ni gsalüîΩba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa rnams dga' ba dang gdung ba la sogs pa'i ngo bos sgra la sogs pa'i yul nye bar yod dam med kyang rung gsal ba gzhan la mi ltos par rang gsal ba'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid rang rig pa 'di'i khyad par ni gsal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The defining characteristic of reflexive awareness is that pleasure and so on are self-clarity, which does not depend on another clarity, whether the object, such as sound, is present or not, due to the essence of pleasure and so on, such as joy and pain.üîΩThe difference between this and other forms of clarity is that it is clarity.

original: gsal ba gzhan la mi ltos pa'i sim pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rang nyid kyis grub ste /
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan la mi ltos pa'i sim pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rang nyid kyis grub ste /
translated: Whatever is the essence of pleasure and so on, which does not depend on another clarity, is established by itself.

original: de ni sems pa can dang bde ba dang rig pa dang / shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs dag gis bstan to //
